title: Virtual Assistant (QA Support) Android App Monitoring (Long-term) (No Experience or Skills Needed)
description:
Looking for 500+ Android users to help test and monitor Android app stability and connectivity across different phone and tablet brands/models while the device is online (compatibility/stability testing).



This is very simple: install the app from the Google Play Store, keep it running, and follow short testing/verification steps when requested.



What you do (simple):

- Install the app via Google Play Store (no APK/sideload)

- Keep it running in the background (You can use other apps / use device as always)

- Keep the device online as much as possible (target: 20–24h/day)

- Short weekly check-in / testing steps / reporting (to confirm stability + uptime)



Why it’s a good fit:

- No experience or special skills needed

- No calls, no meetings

- Works alongside any VA/freelance job

- Setup once ? keep running long-term

- Great for anyone who wants a low-effort side gig



Requirements:

- Android device (phone or tablet)

- Stable internet

- Phone online most of the day (target: 20–24h/day uptime)

- Reliable/consistent (uptime & response time matter)



? Please do NOT apply if:

- Your phone is only online a few hours/day

- You use airplane mode at night / regularly disconnect

- You only use iPhone/iPad



? We’re prioritizing reliable testers who can keep a device online 20–24h/day.



How to apply:

Fill out this short form (takes 2 minutes): 
 



If you qualify, I’ll send setup instructions and your access code.

title: Marketing Coordinator (Full-time remote work, earn up to USD 1,600)
description:
Background



The Reliability Academy delivers world-class online training and coaching to clients and students across the globe. To date, we have helped 100+ companies, and trained 2000+ industry professionals, across 50+ countries in all major industries. Founded in 2018, we are headquartered in Brisbane, Australia but work virtually with most of our team based in the Philippines.



Please note this role is advertised as based in the Philippines but we are open to applications for people anywhere in the world.



About Us



Our customers are in all parts of the world, from individuals to large multinational companies. We have big plans and are working to deliver our online training in 8-10 different languages to better serve our customers. We believe in being a force for good and that means:



- building a great company with a strong focus on our values and behaviors. We are building a small, but mighty team that truly enjoys working together and delivers a world-class product and experience to our customers.

- serving our niche to the best of our ability and reaching those less fortunate than us. To that purpose, we have launched the Reliability Academy Scholarship Program enabling students in developing nations to access our training with a 75% Scholarship

- aligning our company mission and vision to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals



The company is growing with a small team of full-time and part-time contractors working across the Asia-Pacific region, currently all reporting to the General Manager, also based in the Philippines whilst our Managing Director is based in Brisbane, Australia. We deliberately hire talent in different regions of the world to keep costs down, create diversity, and build a multi-lingual team.



Role Purpose 



The Marketing Coordinator is responsible for driving online sales growth through B2C marketing initiatives, with a focus on optimizing existing systems, improving conversion performance, and ensuring every campaign contributes directly to revenue. 



This role will oversee the Affiliate Program, manage lead segmentation using RightMessage, and conduct a full audit and optimization of HubSpot
 sequences—including welcome and nurture workflows—to ensure maximum engagement and conversion. 



The Marketing Coordinator will also manage and monitor paid campaigns to drive online course sales and continually refine strategies based on data and performance insights. 



Responsibilities  



As Marketing Coordinator your initial responsibilities will consist of: 



Demand Generation and Strategy 



-Develop and execute marketing strategies aligned with company goals, focusing on driving online B2C conversions. 

-Plan and manage marketing campaigns, PPC campaigns primarily for B2C (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads,
 Ads)

-Continuously monitor, test, and tweak campaigns to optimize results and maximize performance.

-Use RightMessage to manage lead segmentation, ensuring the right message reaches the right audience (B2B and B2C). Monitor performance, refine targeting, and adjust settings as needed by leveraging analytics / insights from Segmetrics. 



Affiliate Program Management 



-Oversee and manage the company’s Affiliate Program using TrackDesk.

-Test and validate system functionality, ensuring affiliates are properly tracked and rewarded.

-Monitor affiliate performance, identify top-performing partners, and develop strategies to drive participation and conversions. 



 Marketing and Automation 



-Review, audit, and optimize
 sequences and workflows within HubSpot, including welcome sequences and nurturing campaigns. 

-Identify opportunities to improve engagement and conversion rates. 

-Make recommendations for adjustments and implement approved changes. 

-Ensure marketing automation and workflows support the company’s inbound marketing and lead nurturing goals. 



Marketing Analytics and HubSpot Management 



-Develop and maintain a marketing performance dashboard to track key metrics, such as lead volume, conversion rates, and website traffic. 

-Integrate and manage HubSpot, cold
 systems, and campaign tracking tools for marketing automation, lead tracking, and reporting. 

-Analyze performance data to optimize campaigns and recommend improvements. 

-Report on marketing activities and outcomes to the General Manager and Managing Director. 





What Success Looks Like 



Succeeding in this role will mean the Marketing Team establishes a steadily growing flow of online course sales, supported by consistent brand visibility and engagement across all channels.  



Success will be measured by the following metrics: 



-Affiliate Program is fully operational and generating measurable conversions. 

-RightMessage segmentation is active and optimized for effective lead targeting. 

-HubSpot workflows and sequences are running efficiently and driving engagement and sales. 

-LinkedIn page is active with regular, relevant posts that maintain engagement and brand trust. 

-Paid campaigns on Google, LinkedIn, and
 achieve an average 
 of 3x or higher. 

-Overall marketing performance shows measurable improvement in lead quality, conversion rates, and ROI. 

 



About You 



Knowledge and skills are important, but we will primarily hire based on attitude and behavior. We are looking for someone who: 



-Is self-motivated and proactive with a positive attitude and a great work ethic. 

-Takes ownership of their work and is results-driven, constantly seeking to improve and optimize. 

-Communicates clearly and effectively, both with internal teams and external stakeholders. 

-Has a deep understanding of inbound marketing strategies and can balance creativity with data-driven decisions. 

-Enjoys working remotely and thrives in a remote, collaborative environment and is comfortable managing a distributed, diverse team.   

-Is passionate about inbound marketing and embraces data-driven decision-making. 



Your Skills 



Your knowledge, skills and experience: 



-Proven experience in inbound and outbound marketing, and demand generation. 

-Strong digital marketing skills: PPC ads (Google, LinkedIn,
), SEO, outbound (cold
 / LinkedIn outreach) 

-Experience managing marketing performance metrics and reporting on results. 

-Experience with HubSpot Marketing Solution is a requirement; Candidates with experience on Segmetrics, RightMessage and TrackDesk (or similar tools) will be given stronger consideration. 

-Experience in PPC campaign management (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads,
 Ads). 

-Excellent organizational and project management skills. 

-Excellent copywriting and proof-reading skills.  

-You are fluent in English with excellent written and verbal communication skills. Your written English is clear, concise, and accurate. 

-A sound understanding / experience with automation tools and AI (LLMs, agents) would be a bonus, as would experience in leading/managing/coordinating a team 



What’s on Offer



This is a long-term virtual role allowing you to work from home. You will work during Australian business hours i.e. your workday will fall between 7 am to 7 pm GMT+10 to ensure overlap with the rest of the team (who are based in the Philippines). There will be a 3-month probation period.



Base pay between USD 1,000 and USD 1,600 per month depending on experience and skills, with a 13th-month pay in December, 20 days of paid leave, an annual allowance of USD 1,000 towards Private Health Insurance and a chance to earn a performance bonus up to 3 months of salary (subject to business and personal performance).



Applying



If you are interested, please complete the online application (see link below) summarizing your background, experience, and what makes you an excellent candidate for the role. Tell us about yourself, your skills, and why you’re interested in working with us.



Application form: 



This is an important requirement for Reliability Academy, and we would love to have someone on seat as soon as possible, but we will take our time to find the right candidate. That means we will be shortlisting and interviewing soon after this job post has gone live and will continue until we find the right candidate. Therefore, this job could stay open for several weeks or close quickly



Please note, that if you do not apply via the above application form your application will not be considered. We appreciate people who pay attention to detail so please mention the words “Green Banana” when we ask about your aspirations in life.

title: Head of OPS | Fastest growing DTC brands in the english speaking markets
description:
Head of Operations (Remote – E-commerce)



We are building one of the fastest-growing direct-to-consumer jewelry brands and scaling toward becoming one of the top 5 jewelry DTC brands in our market.



Our team operates fully remote across multiple departments including Customer Support, Supply Chain, Creative, Marketing, and Finance. With growth comes complexity, and we are now looking for a Head of Operations who can bring structure, clarity, and execution across the company.



This is not a passive role. This is a high-impact position where you will work directly with the founder as a right hand to ensure departments run smoothly, reporting is consistent, and operational bottlenecks are solved early.



If you enjoy building structure, improving workflows, and managing remote teams in a fast-moving e-commerce environment, this opportunity can become a long-term career path with strong growth potential.

Operational Leadership

title: Creative Project Manager & Design Operations VA
description:
Role Overview

This role exists to own the front line of client communication and creative operations, so Blake is no longer fielding constant messages, prioritization questions, or timeline pressure.

The person in this role will act as the intake manager, scheduler, and expectation-setter for all client requests, while also serving as a detail-oriented creative reviewer and backup designer when needed.

Their primary job is to receive requests, acknowledge them quickly, set realistic timelines, prioritize work appropriately, and ensure delivery happens smoothly without Blake needing to be involved in every step.



Core Responsibilities

Client Intake, Response & Expectation Management (Critical)

Monitor inbound client requests across
 and other channels

Ensure every client request receives a timely response, even if work cannot start immediately

Acknowledge receipt of requests with clear, calm, professional messaging such as:

“Thanks for sending this over, I’ve got it in the queue”

“We’re targeting delivery by Friday”

“I’ll follow up if we need anything else”

Set realistic turnaround times based on workload, complexity, and priority

Manage urgent requests without letting everything become “urgent”

Push back diplomatically when timelines are unrealistic

Proactively update clients if timelines shift

Reduce client anxiety by making sure no message goes unanswered

This person effectively buffers the client from urgency, pressure, and constant context switching.



Work Prioritization & Scheduling

Evaluate incoming requests and determine:

Urgency vs importance

Retainer work vs project work

Simple edit vs complex revision

Prioritize tasks appropriately across multiple clients

Schedule work in ClickUp based on real capacity, not client pressure

Balance deadlines so designers can work efficiently without fire drills

Flag overload or conflicts early and propose solutions



Creative Project Management

Translate client requests into clear, fully scoped ClickUp tasks



Ensure every task includes:

Complete instructions and context

Correct files, links, and Drive folders

Client history and scope notes

Due dates that match communicated timelines

Assign work to the client or the primary graphic designer

Track progress and follow up internally as needed

Edit Intake, Translation & Handoff

Receive and interpret client edit notes, including multi-point and detailed feedback

Clarify vague or confusing requests before work begins



D
 whether edits should be:

Completed directly

Handed off to the primary designer

Translate client language into clear, actionable design instructions

Verify all requested changes were executed correctly before delivery

Design QA & Review

Review all creative work before it goes to the client



Check for:

Spelling and copy accuracy

Alignment, spacing, centering, and pixel-level precision

Image resolution and export quality

Basic design and brand consistency

Catch issues early to reduce rework and client revisions

Act as the final internal checkpoint before delivery

Backup Graphic Design Support

Handle small or urgent edits when appropriate

Make minor design adjustments such as:

Pixel shifts

Small copy changes

Simple layout corrections

Step in temporarily if the primary designer is unavailable

This is a support function, not the main focus of the role

Contracts, Scopes & Admin Support

Draft scopes of work using provided formulas and guidelines

Estimate timelines and hours for Blake to review

Revise proposals and scopes as requested

Prepare and resend updated documents when changes are approved

Send W-9s and supporting documents to clients as needed

Track approvals and confirmations before work begins

File & Workflow Organization

Maintain clean file structures and naming conventions in Google Drive

Rename batches and files so clients clearly understand deliverables

Ensure ClickUp, Drive, and client communications stay aligned

Prevent confusion by keeping systems clean and up to date



Tools & Platforms

ClickUp

Google Drive

Figma

Adobe Illustrator

Adobe Photoshop

Adobe InDesign

Canva



Shopify, Webflow, WordPress, Squarespace, Wix (working familiarity)

title: Remote Sales Consumer Advisor
description:
Company Overview

We are a US-based, remote-first consumer services business that helps clients resolve and exit unwanted long-term contracts. Our marketing engine is performing well, and we are expanding the sales team to increase close volume while maintaining a high-trust, consultative customer experience.



Role Summary

We are hiring two full-time Remote Sales Consumer Advisors to support a growing inbound lead flow. This is a closing role, not a cold-calling role. You will speak with primarily older, US-based prospects, educate them on the service, answer questions, guide them through the agreement live, collect required information, and then hand the client off to fulfillment.

This is a strong fit for someone who is confident on the phone, organized in a CRM, and comfortable handling sensitive conversations with clarity and empathy.



Work Hours

Full-time, 40 hours per week

US CST hours by default

Monthly performance bonus: tiered structure based on results

Bonus is tied to cash received, not just closed deals



Key Responsibilities

1) Phone Sales and Closing

Handle inbound and assigned leads, run consultative sales conversations

Build trust quickly with an older US demographic

Clearly explain the service, process, expectations, and next steps

Confidently ask for the sale, overcome objections, and close deals

Close within a typical cycle of same day to 14 days, including follow-ups as needed



2) Contract Review and Client Commitment

Walk clients through the agreement in real time on the call

Ensure clients understand what they are signing up for

Collect required details accurately to avoid downstream fulfillment issues





3) CRM and Lead Management (GoHighLevel)

Log all activity in the CRM with clean notes and accurate statuses

Follow the team’s lead management process to avoid missed follow-ups

Upload new clients into the CRM upon close, then hand off to fulfillment





4) Follow-up Discipline

Execute structured follow-up sequences to recover leads and close within the window

Stay responsive and organized across callbacks, scheduled follow-ups, and inbound replies





5) Performance and Continuous Improvement

Participate in daily quick check-ins during ramp (approx. 20 minutes)

Review performance metrics, identify breakdowns, and apply coaching fast

Contribute feedback to improve scripts, training docs, and call flow





Success Metrics

Contact rate and speed to first response

Show rate for scheduled calls

Close rate and close cycle length (0 to 14 days typical)

Revenue collected (used for bonus calculations)

CRM hygiene, no missed leads, accurate notes, consistent follow-ups

Call quality, clarity, trust-building, compliance with process



Required Skills and Experience

2+ years in phone-based sales, inside sales, or high-ticket closing preferred

Strong closing instincts, objection handling, and consultative communication

High comfort speaking with older US prospects

Strong CRM habits, preferably GoHighLevel (or similar CRMs)

Reliable internet, quiet workspace, professional headset setup

Coachable, consistent, and able to ramp quickly with daily feedback



Accent and Language Preferences

Strong preference for a neutral, easy-to-understand English accent

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

- Full-time opportunity

- Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

- Competitive pay

- Training and growth opportunities

- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Salary range

- Php 40,000 - Php 65,000 (based on experience)



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.






If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Experienced Web Scraping/ Data Engineer / Python / Automation Engineer / Backend Developer
description:
Hey there smarty pants!



My name is Jason and I run one of the top eBay shoe stores in the US for men's and women's shoes for over 6 years. Think of your Nike's, Asics, Adidas, Hoka, etc. I am looking to bring on an experienced technical person to join our small, but intimate team.



Current Challenge:



We use many different supplier websites to fulfill our orders, and this list is growing. We don't use huge ecommerce websites like Amazon, Walmart, or Walmart, our main suppliers are shoe retailers like Nike, Finishline, FootLocker, and even small mom and pop shoe stores that host their website using Shopify. However, everything is done manually by our team, meaning every day, we need to go on the supplier website, check price and inventory levels, and then manually update our listings on eBay. This process is not only time consuming, it regularly causes issues such as missing a sale/markdown, selling shoes that are already out of stock, and prevents us from reaching higher levels as add more shoes means more time added to updating our price and stock levels.



Who We Are Looking For:



We want to optimize and automate our price and stock checking process as much as possible. If you've built and maintained web scrapers at scale, understand the full web scraping stack (proxies, browser automation, parsing, anti-bot bypass), an expert in organizing scraped data in a spreadsheet, can make smart decisions about tools and costs, or if all this web scraping talk is a piece of cake for you based on your technical skill level, you are who we are looking for.



As I said before, we use a lot of different supplier websites, so each website will need its own solution. Some are difficult to scrape, some are easy, some requires you to add item to cart before getting price. If you completely understand what I am talking about and you are already thinking of solutions in your head, please keep reading..



Must Have's:



3-5+ years of professional working experience in web scraping, data engineering, full-stack/backend development, or automation engineering, basically, work where building scrapers would be an easy straightforward task, not a stretch.



Proficient in Python and/or JavaScript (Node.js):

- Most scraping work is done in Python (BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Playwright, requests) or JavaScript (Puppeteer, Playwright)

- You need to be able to write real code, not just use no-code tools



Deep understanding of the web scraping stack

- Fetching (HTTP requests, headless browsers, Playwright/Puppeteer)

- Anti-bot bypass (proxies, residential IPs, fingerprinting, CAPTCHAs)

- Parsing (CSS selectors, XPath, or AI-based extraction)

- Scheduling and orchestration

- You know when to use what, and why



Strong Google Sheets and Google Apps Script skills:

- This is important. The logic layer and dashboard will live in Google Sheets.

- You should be comfortable building complex formulas, data transformations, and automated workflows in Sheets

- You should be able to write Apps Script to process data, run calculations, trigger actions, and connect to external APIs

- If you've built systems where Google Sheets is the "brain" that processes incoming data and outputs decisions — that's exactly what I need

- I'm not looking for someone who thinks Sheets is "just a spreadsheet." I need someone who knows how to make it do real work.



Familiarity with modern tools and services:

- You know what Apify, Bright Data, ScraperAPI, Browse AI, etc. are

- You understand the tradeoffs between building custom vs using services

- You can make smart decisions about cost vs complexity



Cost-conscious mindset:

- I need someone who thinks about "what's the cheapest way to reliably solve this", not "what's the most technically impressive"

- We will be making a lot of requests, so we must keep variable costs as low as possible.



API integration experience:

- You've connected systems together via APIs before

- You don't need eBay-specific experience, but you should be comfortable figuring it out



Ability to be self-directed and own your decisions

- I'll explain the business requirements and any context needed. You figure out and build the technical approach/solution.

- I'm not a developer, nor is anyone else on the team. We need someone who can make decisions, not just take orders and wait for instructions.



Bonus

- Professional experience with AI/LLM automation or integration

- Familiarity with eBay backend/API



Day-to-Day:



You will be building web scrapers (or any other solutions) to get data we need for update-to-date price/stock levels and then maintaining these scrapers, fixing any alerts/flags that pop. You will also be building and maintaining the logic layer in Google Sheets & Google Apps Script. This layer contains the complex logic, formulas, and automations that turn the raw scraped data into useful information that will be displayed in the command layer. You will also be building and maintaining the command layer dashboard for all tea
mbers to use. This layer will show the useful information such as final price, best supplier, stock levels, any alerts/items that need attention. You will also be building and maintaining the automation to eBay, making sure that all price and stock changes from each scrape cycle is automatically updating our eBay listings smoothly.



Long story short, you will be in charge of making sure that our process from building the scrapers for each website to automating our eBay listings is running smoothly.



Once this upfront work is finished and we are in maintenance mode, we will be using your expertise to automate other processes our business. At the end of the day, our business is very simple and don't take much technical knowledge to automate.



Logistics & Salary:



- Full-time, fully remote,

- Preferably Mon-Fri (PST), especially in the beginning, but can be negotiable

- Communication through Slack

- Ready to begin immediately

- Salary ranging anywhere from $5-$12 USD per hour, of course, all based on experience



Final Remarks:



If any of this sounds confusing, or worse, you don't even have at least 3 year of actual working professional experience (one-time projects do not count), please do not apply as we will be wasting our times. After all, for the person who is truly experienced, web scraping is a quite the low level skill, even for complex websites with anti bot technology. So, if you are a person who has worked in environments where much higher technical skills were required from you than simple web scraping and data organization, you are someone we would love to add to our team!



How To Apply:



Please don't send me a generic cover letter or your life story. I just want to see that you've done this kind of work, or work that would make this look like a walk in the park. I also want you to see your ability to think though the problem. Send me:



- A brief intro: who you are, where you're based, and why you think you are perfect for this role

- Relevant experience(s): any professional working experience, no one off projects or experiences that has nothing to do with what I am looking for

- Your approach: briefly tell me in your own words/understanding what the issue is with my currently process and how you would approach solving this issue

- Your rate: whatever you prefer, just give me a ballpark if you are unsure



Message me with the subject line "GSTEAM AUTOMATOR". Subject lines without this will be ignored. Also, DO NOT SEND
S, I will not respond.



If something in this post is unclear, please feel free to ask, I would be glad to clarify.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Expert Property Acquisitions Associate
description:
Summary

Role Overview

The Acquisitions Associate is responsible for building and managing Parity’s property acquisition pipeline. This role owns the front end of the development funnel: identifying absentee owners of vacant and distressed properties, maintaining a clean and accurate owner database, conducting outbound outreach, and negotiating purchase terms that align with Parity’s mission and financial parameters. This is a hands-on role that blends data management, outbound communication, negotiation, and coordination with legal and development teams.



Key Responsibilities

1. Acquisition Pipeline & Database Management

• Build, maintain, and continuously clean a database of absentee owners of vacant and distressed properties.

• Aggregate and verify ownership data from public records, tax data, and third-party sources.

• Track owner status, outreach history, responsiveness, and deal stage in Parity’s CRM or database.

• Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency across systems.



2. Owner Outreach & Relationship Management

• Execute outbound outreach campaigns via phone,
, and direct mail.

• Respond to inbound inquiries from property owners.

• Build rapport with owners and clearly communicate Parity’s mission, process, and timelines.

• Maintain consistent follow-up to move owners through the decision-making process.

3. Deal Evaluation & Negotiation

• Conduct preliminary deal screening based on location, condition, and feasibility.

• Negotiate purchase price and basic terms within pre-approved parameters.

• Coordinate property walk-throughs and inspections with internal teams.

• Prepare internal deal summaries and recommendations.

4. Transaction Coordination

• Work closely with legal counsel, title companies, and internal staff through contract and closing.

• Track deal milestones and ensure timely progression to settlement.

• Maintain organized records of contracts, correspondence, and transaction documents.

5. Process Improvement & Reporting

• Help refine acquisition workflows, templates, and outreach scripts.

• Track and report on key metrics such as outreach volume, response rates, conversions, and acquisitions.

• Identify bottlenecks and propose improvements to increase acquisition velocity.



Required Qualifications

• 2–5 years of experience in real estate, acquisitions, development, sales, or a related field.

• Strong organizational skills and comfort managing large datasets.

• Experience with outbound outreach (calls,
s, mail campaigns).

• Demonstrated negotiation skills and comfort having direct financial conversations.

• Clear, professional written and verbal communication.

• High attention to detail and follow-through.

• Experience with property acquisition.

• CRM and database experience (Airtable, HubSpot, etc.).

• Comfort working in a mission-driven, fast-paced environment.

title: Motion Graphics Artist & Graphic Designer
description:
*** Please read through the entire post before applying.  Thanks! ***



Company Description

Engage Video Production (EVP) creates educational and communication focused video content, primarily for aerospace, defense, and technical clients. Our work helps high stakes organizations explain complex ideas clearly, train teams effectively, and communicate with absolute precision. We operate with a military grade standard of excellence and are looking for a Motion Graphics Artist & Graphic Designer who is ready to grow within a high accountability environment.



The Three Pillars of Success at EVP

To succeed here, you must embody these three core values:



Discipline: You follow through on every task without "floundering" or ghosting. You possess the self-discipline to manage your time and meet deadlines without constant supervision.



Motivation and Dedication: You are dedicated to the mission and the company's growth. You don't just "do a job"; you look for ways to contribute to the overall success of the team.



Radical Integrity and Accountability: You own your mistakes immediately. You have the backbone to point out errors for correction, even if they are your own, because you understand that precision is non-negotiable.



*** Role Overview *** 

This is a dual-focus role. You will be the primary creator for our dedicated explainer and motion graphics videos, but you will also assist in the creation of graphic assets (when needed) for our standard video team. You will coordinate with our video editors to provide the graphic elements, overlays, and design assets that elevate every project we produce.

*** Core Responsibilities *** 

Motion Graphics Mastery: Lead the production of full-scale explainer videos, from storyboarding and asset creation to final animation.

Collaborative Design: Act as the internal design resource for our standard video editors. You will create the lower thirds, callouts, and technical diagrams they need for their edits.

Web & Digital Assets: Design high-fidelity web page elements and marketing collateral that align with our brand and our clients' technical standards.

Brand Consistency: Ensure a "Rising Tide" level of quality across all visual touchpoints, maintaining a clean, professional, and sophisticated aesthetic.



*** Must-Have Technical Skills*** 

Technical Stack: Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Illustrator, and Photoshop - or similar graphical editing software.



Portfolio: A strong reel showcasing explainer videos and a portfolio of clean, functional graphic design (web elements, technical icons, etc.).



Leadership/Coordination: Ability to work alongside other editors, providing them with the assets they need to succeed on their timelines.



Communication: Exceptional English skills and a proactive communication style.



*** Compensation ***

Starting at: $350 (~20,000 PHP) to $600 (~34,500 PHP) USD per month, based on 20 hours/week, subject to change. 

Starting Rate: $4.00 to $7.00 USD per hour.  [*Conversions are approximate.]



Part-Time (20 hrs/week): $345 – $605 USD (~?19,500 – ?34,250 PHP) monthly.

Full-Time (40 hrs/week): $640 – $1,120 USD (~?36,800 – ?64,500 PHP) monthly.









Rate Determination: Starting salary/rates are dependent upon experience and demonstrated skill.



A Note on AI and Judgment

At EVP, we use advanced tools every day. However, this role requires high level human judgment and Radical Integrity. We are hiring a human, not a prompt. If you use AI to draft your personal responses in the “How to Apply” section, you are failing the first test of this role: Honesty. We want to hear your real thoughts and see your real personality to ensure you will be a good fit on our team. If your application lacks a unique human voice, it will be discarded. Use AI to assist your workflow later; do not use it to represent your character now.



*** How to Apply ***

To be considered, you must follow these steps exactly. Precision is a requirement for this role.



-Subject Line - change it to: "Technical Visual Artist – [Your Name]".



-Provide a link to your best motion and static design work. (No portfolio = no consideration).



-State the 10th word of our "Three Pillars" section.



-In exactly two sentences, describe a specific time you had to fix a mistake you made in a motion graphics project. Use plain English; no AI-generated fluff.



-Attach or link to your CV/resume.  Must be in PDF format only.



-Want to really stand out? Record a 60-second video (Loom or similar) introducing yourself. Tell me why you are the right pick and what about Aerospace & Defense interests you. Start the video by addressing me by name (Ryan). Applicants who include this video move to the top of the list.



Thanks for your time and genuine interest!

title: Senior Cloud Accountant (Direct Hire / Work from Home)
description:
Join the Team as a Senior  Cloud Accountant at Bean Ninjas USA!

Philippine CPA license highly preferred.



Bean Ninjas USA is on the lookout for enthusiastic and skilled professionals to become part of our expanding team. If you're passionate about cloud accounting and meet the qualifications listed below, we’d love to connect with you!



Filipino candidate must possess the following (Please do not apply if you do not have the following):



~ 3+ years of full-time accounting experience within a BPO or similar environment.

- end-to-end bookkeeping experience including preparation of Balance Sheet and Income Statement

~ Proficient in cloud accounting software and platforms.

~ Strong analytical skills with attention to detail.

~ Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.

~ Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (preferred)

- Has Xero and/or QuickBooks Online experience



Qualifications for the role:



- Full-time work (Mon-Fri) for our US clients within the Philippines working hours of 8 am to 5 pm.

- We also offer flexibility on the schedule at work once you are familiar with the processes and client work.

- Excellent attention to detail and time management skills.

- Team player who would get along well with the rest of the Bean Ninjas team



Specific Responsibilities



In this role, you will look after management reporting and weekly/monthly transaction processing for a portfolio of Bean Ninjas bookkeeping clients.



Bookkeeping Service Delivery



-Uses Xero and QuickBooks Online

-Uses Xero and QBO add-ons and integrations like Hubdoc, A2X, Receipt Bank, Stripe, and Paypal.

-Responds to client queries via our online
 helpdesk software Helpscout.

-Communicates with other staff via Slack.

-You write well: concise, understandable, helpful, professional, and fast. You can build rapport with others solely through your writing.



Remote work

-You’re self-motivated and ideally, have previous experience working remotely and with little direct supervision.

-You must have an excellent internet connection.

-You know how to keep your computer and work secure and private.

-You know the joys of using two monitors (or splitting a big monitor) to do bookkeeping work.



Who are we?

Bean Ninjas is a bookkeeping and financial reporting business founded on Australia’s Gold Coast in 2015.



We specialize in eCommerce businesses and our mission is to create financial freedom through stress-free business finances for our clients.



We have over 16 Philippine tea
mbers here and we are growing!



What’s it like being part of the Bean Ninjas team?



Career development

We believe in developing our team and promoting internally. You will go through an initial 6-month training program and will then receive ongoing training and mentoring. We prepare individual staff development plans for each tea
mber.



Flexible and remote role

This is a remote role and you will have some level of flexibility in choosing your regular work hours, but must generally be online during Philippine working hours.



Benefits

We offer a variety of benefits from 13th-month pay, birthday vouchers, birthday time off, accrued leaves, and Christmas shutdown leave (where everyone does not need to log in to work for a couple of days during the Christmas shutdown which is usually 5 to 7 working days, yet these days are still paid for by the company!), 6-week maternity leave, remote social activities, and pieces of training and up to date certifications for our accountants on various accounting platforms or integrations.



Bean Ninjas is recognized as an industry leader. You will be working alongside Chartered Accountants and CPAs who have come from firms such as Ernst and Young, BDO, and Grant Thornton.



We won the Xero Australia Bookkeeping Partner of the Year Award in 2019 and the equivalent state award for Queensland in both 2017 and 2019.



Applications can be sent to 
 and include a copy of your resume. Please do not apply if you have no relevant experience or are only looking for a project-based role. Thank you!

title: Amazon Brand Manager & Brand Manager Intern
description:
AMAZON BRAND MANAGER



We are looking for a talented and versatile Amazon Brand Manager! If you think that you have what it takes to be successful in this role, we welcome you to apply!



Do you like going from one meeting to another with non-stop action and solving problems every day while managing 8 people? Where you are trying to please clients and juggling tons of competing priorities? If so, this is the job for you.

- Agency & Management: Experience handling multiple demands, leading teams, hiring, and performance management.

- Tech-Savvy: Comfortable with tools like Zoom, Slack, Asana, and adapting in fast-changing environments.

- Passion for eCommerce: Independent, people-focused, and driven to grow client sales on Amazon.



Expectations:

AMAZON BRAND MANAGER INTERN



Want to catapult out of that “Walmart uniform” and into a world of digital marketing?

We're looking for:

So what are you waiting for? Toss away that nametag and make the switch today.

title: Client Success & CRM Coordinator (GoHighLevel) — VA
description:
About Mudaris Healthcare



Mudaris Healthcare supports families of medically fragile children by helping them navigate care services and coordinating dependable nursing support. We’re looking for a reliable, high-ownership virtual assistant who can keep our CRM clean, keep our phones answered, and keep families and leads moving forward with clarity and care.



What You’ll Do (Core Responsibilities)



Phone Coverage (must be dependable)



Answer inbound calls quickly during assigned hours (and route urgent calls appropriately)



Provide a warm, professional first impression for families, partners, and nurses



Log every call outcome in GoHighLevel (notes, tags, next steps)



CRM Hygiene (GoHighLevel)



Maintain accurate contact records (names, phone/email, county, child/patient notes, referral source, status)



Update pipeline stages daily and ensure no lead is left without a next action



Apply tags, tasks, and notes consistently so reporting is clean and reliable



Deduplicate contacts and correct errors (typos, missing fields, wrong stages)



Lead Follow-Up + Nurture



Follow up with new inquiries within SLA (ex: within 5–10 minutes during business hours)



Send/answer SMS and
s using approved templates and tone



Re-engage stalled leads and ensure every lead has a clear next step scheduled



Appointments, Intake, and Scheduling



Confirm appointments (intake calls, meet & greets, nurse interviews) via text + call



Send reminders and collect required info before calls (basic intake details, availability, documents)



Coordinate scheduling across internal team members, families, and nurses



Reduce no-shows by proactive confirmation and rescheduling workflows



Customer Success (Families + Nurses)



Provide friendly updates, set expectations, and keep communication organized



Escalate urgent issues quickly with clear context (what happened, who’s involved, what’s needed)



Track open items (documents, background checks, onboarding steps) and follow through



Tools You’ll Use



GoHighLevel (required)



Google Workspace (Gmail, Sheets, Drive, Calendar)



Optional but helpful: Dialer/phone system experience, DocuSign, QuickBooks, Jotform/Typeform



Required Skills / Must-Haves



Proficient in GoHighLevel: pipelines, tags, tasks, conversations, workflows, calendars



Strong phone presence: calm, confident, professional, empathetic



Extremely organized: you don’t let leads fall through cracks



Fast and accurate typing + detailed note-taking



Excellent English communication (written + spoken)



Reliable internet + quiet workspace + headset



Nice-to-Haves



Experience in healthcare, home care, Medicaid/GAPP, or staffing coordination



Experience with appointment setting and reducing no-shows



Experience improving workflows / building simple automations in GoHighLevel



Performance Expectations (What “Great” Looks Like)



95%+ of leads contacted within SLA



Near-zero “orphan” leads (every lead has a task + next step)



Clean pipelines with accurate stages and notes



Increased show rates for intake calls and meet & greets



Consistent, compassionate communication that families trust



Schedule / Availability



Must be able to answer calls during scheduled coverage and respond quickly to texts/messages.

description:
We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Paid Media Specialist to manage and scale high-performing Google Ads and Meta Ads campaigns for established 7-figure D2C brands. The ideal candidate has a strong track record in performance marketing, proven ability to achieve profitable ROAS, and deep experience running campaigns for European markets.



In this role, you will be responsible for end-to-end campaign strategy, execution, optimization, and performance reporting across multiple ad platforms. You will work closely with internal teams to drive sustainable growth, maximize return on ad spend, and ensure consistent results across international markets.



This position requires hands-on expertise, attention to detail, and the ability to confidently navigate campaigns in European languages. 



Key Requirements

Google Ads Experience

Minimum 3 consecutive years with the same agency, managing 7-figure or larger D2C brands

OR

Minimum 3 consecutive years with a brand related to bathroom accessories



Meta Ads Experience

Minimum 3 consecutive years with the same agency, managing 7-figure or larger D2C brands

OR

Minimum 3 consecutive years with a brand related to bathroom accessories or kitchen knife categories

Performance & Results

Must be able to provide verifiable past results

At least one case study showing ROAS of 5 or higher

European Market Expertise

Minimum 5 years of experience running Google Ads in European markets

Must have hands-on experience working in at least one European language:

French

German

Italian

Spanish

Dutch



Candidates must be able to demonstrate their ability to navigate and manage campaigns in foreign languages



HYBRID MAKATI SITE 



*How to apply (we can only accept candidates who applied using application form)



1. Copy and paste the form in your browser

2. Leave no spaces behind

https: // forms . gle /GywJEJhG5iNExRYWA

title: UX/UI Designer (Figma|Web and SaaS)
description:

You will work on a variety of projects including web platforms, SaaS products, landing pages, and
 systems. This role offers hands-on collaboration, clear guidance, and opportunities to grow professionally while contributing to real, long-term products.

mbers

title: Social Media Account Manager
description:
Start your application here: 



Compensation and Benefits

- Salary: USD $500–$700 per month (based on experience)

- Full-time position

- 2 days Paid Time Off (PTO) per month after successful completion of the 30-day trial period

- Monthly KPI-based performance bonuses

- Long-term role with career growth opportunities



Work Schedule

- Shift: 7:00 AM – 3:00 PM (Manila time)

- 8 hours per day

- 6 days per week



About the Role

- We are a digital marketing agency looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Social Media Manager to join our team.

- This role involves creating, managing, and growing multiple social media accounts across platforms such as Instagram, - TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and
/X (Threads). You will handle daily posting, follow platform best practices, track performance, and help accounts grow organically.

- This position is ideal for someone who is organized, comfortable managing multiple accounts, and able to maintain consistent daily output.



Key Responsibilities

- Create and manage social media accounts across multiple platforms

- Plan and execute daily content posting schedules

- Develop platform-specific posting and growth strategies

- Monitor account performance and optimize content accordingly

- Maintain organized records of account credentials and metrics

- Ensure accounts follow natural and authentic growth patterns

- Apply best practices for account security and scaling

- Perform basic video editing using CapCut



Technical Requirements

- Personal computer dedicated for work use only (not shared during shifts)

- Ability to run time-tracking software (Gastime, DeskTime, or equivalent)

- Knowledge of proxy usage for account management

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Backup internet connection for outages

- Basic troubleshooting skills

- Experience using social media management tools

- Basic proficiency in CapCut for video editing



Required Qualifications

- Strong English communication skills (high B to C level)

- Proven experience managing multiple social media accounts

- Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

- Good technical skills with computers and mobile devices

- Reliable and punctual

- Experience using Apple devices (MacBooks and iPhones)



Preferred Qualifications

- Experience with social media growth strategies

- Knowledge of content curation and platform best practices

- Familiarity with social media analytics

- Ability to adapt to frequent platform updates and algorithm changes

- Experience managing multiple accounts simultaneously



Professional Development

- Training on social media growth strategies and platform algorithms

- Hands-on experience with proven multi-platform growth methods

- Ongoing learning and upskilling

- Career advancement opportunities within the agency

description:
Application Link:

We are looking for a reliable Video Editor to create high-quality Instagram Reels from raw footage. You will work with our creative team to deliver clean, engaging short-form videos consistently.

This is a long-term role with clear salary growth and performance bonuses.

- Add captions, graphics, transitions, and basic motion effects

- Follow Instagram specs and daily deadlines

- Organize files and project folders

- Keep up with short-form video trends

- Experience editing short-form or social media videos

- Skilled in Premiere Pro, CapCut, After Effects, or similar

- Good attention to detail

- Can handle feedback and revisions

- Stable internet and computer





Salary Structure (USD / month)

Months 1–3: $500 + $125 KPI bonus

Months 4–6: $550 + $125 KPI bonus

Month 7+: $600 + $125 KPI bonus

description:

 - Data-driven content strategy

title: AirBnB Bookings and Sales Support VA
description:
***To proceed with the application process, please upload your resume into this Google form:
 and select the Virtual Assistant role.***



About Us

Month2Month is a premier hospitality company committed to providing exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for our guests. We pride ourselves on our dedication to customer satisfaction and aim to create a welcoming, comfortable environment for all our guests. We are currently seeking a highly motivated and customer-focused Property Management Virtual Assistant – Customer Support to join our team and help enhance the guest experience.



The standard work schedule is 9:00 AM–6:00 PM Pacific Time, with occasional shifts required from 9:00 AM–6:00 PM Philippines Standard Time based on business needs.



Lead Conversion & Listing Performance



- Own the end-to-end performance of assigned listings, ensuring titles, images, pricing, and descriptions are optimized to attract qualified leads.

- Monitor traffic and inquiry patterns to proactively identify drop-offs or risk trends; flag under-performing listings and propose adjustments.

- Coordinate with the pricing and marketing teams to run experiments (A/B testing of photos, headlines, promotions, etc.).

- Maintain platform health and visibility to maximize occupancy and lead-to-booking conversion rate.

-  Address guest questions related to bookings, remove concerns, and encourage reservations.

 - Highlight property features, amenities, and location to improve inquiry-to-booking conversion rates.

 - Provide reasonable suggestions within the rules of each listing, such as check-in procedures, flexibility, and policy explanations.

- Convert online interest into clients

- Airbnb/VRBO/Zillow Message Response

- Respond to guest inquiries and messages in real time through the Airbnb Inbox.

- Maintain a high response rate (90%+) and fast response time (within a few minutes).



Stay Support



- Send welcome messages, check-in instructions, location guides, and other templates before arrival.

- Ensure guests clearly understand key information such as check-in time, door lock codes, and parking details.

- Assist guests with any issues during their stay, such as WiFi, door locks, or appliance usage.

- Coordinate with cleaning or maintenance teams when urgent issues arise.

- Update Airbnb calendars, availability, pricing, and minimum night settings (using PMS systems or Airbnb control panel).

- Coordinate cleaning schedules for check-ins and check-outs.

- Report booking status, occupancy rates, inquiry volume, and other relevant data.



Preferred Qualifications



- Fluency in English

- 2+ years in short-term rental, property management, or OTA platform operations.

- Listing - creation and updating experience

- Pricing experience

- Sales experience

- Understanding of Airbnb, VRBO, and related booking platforms.

- Strong data sense — you know how to interpret lead performance and platform analytics.

- Experience working with remote teams and cross-functional ops.

- Excellent written communication and guest empathy skills.

- Ability to work in shifts and adapt to cross-time-zone schedules.

- Strong multitasking abilities with the capacity to identify issues quickly and provide effective solutions.

- Proficient in basic office tools (spreadsheets, documents) and PMS systems.

 - Customer-centric mindset with strong empathy, patience, and problem-solving skills.



***To proceed with the application process, please upload your resume into this Google form:
 and select the Virtual Assistant role.***

description:
Please Apply Here: 



Job Description

We’re looking for a proactive and highly organised Customer Support Representative to join our remote team. In this role, you’ll deliver exceptional service to clients through live messaging support, helping them resolve issues, answer questions, and navigate our platform. You’ll be trained in one of the most comprehensive onboarding programmes in the industry to ensure you succeed.



Benefits

- Competitive pay: $700 - $1,200 upon achievement of KPIs

- 2 days of paid holiday per month

- 4 days of paid sick leave per year

- Fully remote – work from anywhere

- Performance-based bonus incentive

- Industry-leading training in client communication and customer service



Key Responsibilities

- Deliver prompt, friendly, and professional support to customers who have technical issues or need further information

- Understand client concerns and provide accurate, thoughtful solutions

- Use Google Sheets and notion for reporting and communication

- Record client interactions and maintain detailed logs for internal use

- Maintain high attention to detail while handling multiple conversations simultaneously



Qualifications & Traits

- Degree preferred, ideally in Communications, Psychology, Marketing, or similar

- Excellent written English (C1 minimum); native or near-native fluency preferred

- Fast and accurate typing — you may be managing several conversations at once

- Experience living or studying in an English-speaking environment is a plus

- Highly organised, dependable, and self-motivated

- Technically proficient with Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, etc.)

- Naturally helpful, client-focused, and solutions-driven

- Detail-oriented and calm under pressure

title: Part-Time Operations & Communications Virtual Assistant (Community Support Role)
description:
Blount Beginnings Inc. provides housing stabilization and workforce development services to individuals working toward rebuilding stability after homelessness, incarceration, or long-term unemployment.



We serve people during some of the most challenging 
nts of their lives. Because of this, how we communicate matters just as much as what we do.



We are seeking someone personable, patient, and professional who can help ensure every caller and partner interaction reflects care and respect.



?



Important — Please Read Carefully



This role is often the first voice people hear when contacting our organization.



We are not looking for a scripted call-center personality.



We are looking for someone who:

 • listens well

 • communicates calmly

 • treats people with dignity

 • understands empathy and professionalism



Our organization is based in the Southern United States where kindness, patience, and authenticity matter.



?



Position Overview



The Operations & Communications Virtual Assistant manages organizational calls, inquiries, follow-ups, and internal tracking systems to ensure nothing falls through the cracks.



You help ensure every opportunity and every person receives a timely response.



?



Responsibilities



Call & Intake Management

 • Answer incoming organizational calls

 • Return voi
s when needed

 • Provide approved program information

 • Log inquiries accurately

 • Route urgent matters appropriately



?



Relationship Follow-Up

 • Send thank-you and follow-up communications

 • Maintain donor and partner records

 • Track ongoing engagement



?



Systems & Tracking



Maintain organizational trackers including:

 • partner contacts

 • inquiries

 • referrals

 • program updates



?



Light Social Media Support

 • Assist with 3–4 weekly posts

 • Share approved updates and success stories

 • Maintain consistent presence



(No heavy marketing required.)



?



Ideal Candidate



You may thrive here if you:

 • Enjoy helping people

 • Speak clearly and kindly

 • Stay organized under changing priorities

 • Work independently

 • Are dependable and emotionally intelligent

 • Understand professionalism without sounding robotic



?



Required Skills

 • Excellent spoken English

 • Professional phone presence

 • Google Workspace experience

 • Reliable internet connection

 • Strong attention to detail



?



Compensation



Weekly compensation provided with opportunity for long-term role growth as the organization expands.



?



IMPORTANT APPLICATION INSTRUCTION



To confirm you read this entire post:



Please begin your application with:



 “I believe kindness builds trust.”



Also include:

 1. A short example of how you handled a difficult customer or caller.

 2. Confirmation of EST availability.



Applications missing these items will not be reviewed.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
description:
Full-Time | Remote | Recruiting in South Africa & Philippines

Australian-Based Award-Winning Digital Marketing Agency



About Us



We are an Australian-based, award-winning digital marketing agency specialising in PPC (Google Ads & Meta Ads) and CRO (Conversion Rate Optimisation).

Everything we do is built around two clear goals:



1. Help our clients generate more sales through smart, performance-driven marketing.

We use strategic paid media and conversion optimisation to drive measurable, scalable growth.



2. Produce award-level creative work that elevates brands.

We believe high-end design increases perceived value, builds credibility, and strengthens every marketing touchpoint — from ads and landing pages to brand identity and content assets.



We work across a wide range of industries — including insurance, e-commerce, pizza franchises, online florists, childcare centres, restaurants, trailers, containers, luxury accommodation, yachts, coaching businesses and more.



Our standard is simple: drive growth and create work we’re proud to win awards for.

Although we are based in Australia, this is a full-time remote position being recruited in South Africa and the Philippines.



The Role



We are looking for a Senior Graphic Designer (5+ years’ experience) who produces polished, high-end design and understands that creative work directly impacts commercial results.

This role is central to how our clients are perceived in their markets. Your work must elevate brand authority, increase perceived value, and support higher conversions across all marketing assets.

You will work across multiple clients and industries, helping us deliver both performance and award-level creative standards.



Key Responsibilities



You will be responsible for high-quality creative output across our client portfolio, including:



• Brand identity design

• Logo development

• Website design

• High-converting landing page design

• Social media ad creative (Meta, Google, display)

• Organic social media content

• Content marketing assets (eBooks, lead magnets, downloadable guides)

• Presentation design (PowerPoint, pitch decks, proposals)

• Marketing materials across digital platforms

Your work must be strategically aligned, commercially effective, and visually refined.



Experience & Skills Required



• 5+ years of professional design experience

• Strong portfolio demonstrating polished, premium, modern design

• Experience working across multiple industries and brand styles

• Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, XD, etc.)

• Comfortable using Canva when required

• Ability to design in Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, and format Excel sheets when necessary

• Strong understanding of branding, typography, layout, hierarchy, and user experience

• Experience in performance marketing environments is highly advantageous



Award-winning experience is advantageous, but not essential. What matters most is your standard of work and ambition to create best-in-class design.



Who This Role Is For?



This role is ideal for someone who:



• Has a genuine passion for high-end design

• Is quality-driven and refuses to produce average work

• Has a strong work ethic and consistently meets deadlines

• Thrives on refinement and attention to detail

• Welcomes feedback and uses it to improve outcomes

• Is excited about helping an agency win more awards

• Wants to help clients grow through premium, high-performance creative



You should want to be among the best in your field — and constantly improving.



Who This Role Is Not For?



This role is not suitable for someone who:



• Treats remote work casually or lacks discipline

• Works on multiple side projects during working hours

• Is looking for a secondary or part-time income

• Delivers “good enough” work instead of five-star work



This is a well-paid, full-time role. In return, we expect full commitment, focus, integrity, and excellence during working hours.

We maintain high standards, strong ethics, and a quality-driven team culture — and we protect that culture carefully.



What You’ll Gain



• Full-time remote flexibility

• Exposure to diverse and exciting industries

• Opportunity to contribute to award-winning campaigns

• A performance-driven, ambitious agency environment

• The chance to refine your craft at a high level

• Meaningful work that directly impacts client growth



How to Apply



If this sounds like you, please send:



• A link to your portfolio to 

• A short introduction explaining why this role would be perfect for you



If you have not heard back from us within 10 days of submitting your portfolio, please consider your application unsuccessful for progression to the next stage.

title: Sales Development Representative (B2B Technology Services)
description:
Sales Development Representative (SDR)

Location: Remote

Target Markets: United Kingdom & United States



About the Company

We are a growing offshore technology services company that helps businesses build and scale high-performing remote engineering teams. We work with UK and US clients to provide vetted software developers, technical specialists, and dedicated support teams.



Role Overview

We are seeking a proactive, target-driven Sales Development Representative (SDR) to generate and qualify new business opportunities. This role is focused on outbound prospecting and booking qualified meetings for the sales team.

The ideal candidate is confident in multi-channel outreach, understands the technology services industry, and is comfortable engaging decision-makers such as CTOs, Heads of Engineering, and Talent Leaders.



Key Responsibilities

Generate leads using the company’s lead generation tools and platforms

Conduct multi-channel outbound outreach (cold calls, LinkedIn,
 campaigns)

Identify and engage potential clients in the UK and US markets

Book qualified discovery meetings for the sales team

Manage and monitor the sales pipeline using HubSpot

Research companies actively hiring or seeking software developers and technical teams

Maintain accurate CRM records and track performance metrics

Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to refine messaging and outreach strategy







Target Clients

C-Level executives

Small-Medium Businesses in North America and United Kingdom

Companies seeking:

Software Developers (Frontend, Backend, Full-Stack)

Technical Developers & Engineers

DevOps & Cloud Specialists

Technical Support Professionals

Offshore or remote engineering teams

And others to be discussed







KPIs & Performance Expectations

Minimum 5 qualified meetings per week

Consistent daily outbound activity (calls,
s, LinkedIn outreach)

Steady pipeline growth and opportunity generation

Accurate CRM management and reporting





Requirements

Minimum of 3 years of experience in B2B outbound sales, SDR, or business development (tech services, staffing, or SaaS preferred)

Experience prospecting into UK and/or US markets

Strong cold calling and LinkedIn prospecting skills

Familiarity with HubSpot or similar CRM tools

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Self-motivated and comfortable working in a remote environment







What We Offer

Fully remote working setup

Competitive base salary + performance-based commission

Growth opportunities within a fast-scaling technology services company

Exposure to international clients and markets





Please complete the google form to move forward -

description:

Job Description

We’re looking for a proactive and highly organised Customer Support Representative to join our remote team. In this role, you’ll deliver exceptional service to clients through live messaging support, helping them resolve issues, answer questions, and navigate our platform. You’ll be trained in one of the most comprehensive onboarding programmes in the industry to ensure you succeed.



Benefits

- Competitive pay: $700 - $1,200 upon achievement of KPIs

- 2 days of paid holiday per month

- 4 days of paid sick leave per year

- Fully remote – work from anywhere

- Performance-based bonus incentive

- Industry-leading training in client communication and customer service



Key Responsibilities

- Deliver prompt, friendly, and professional support to customers who have technical issues or need further information

- Understand client concerns and provide accurate, thoughtful solutions

- Use Google Sheets and notion for reporting and communication

- Record client interactions and maintain detailed logs for internal use

- Maintain high attention to detail while handling multiple conversations simultaneously



Qualifications & Traits

- Technically proficient with Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, etc.)

- Naturally helpful, client-focused, and solutions-driven

- Detail-oriented and calm under pressure

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
Application Link: 



Compensation & Benefits

Salary: USD $500–$700 per month (depending on experience)

Employment Type: Full-time

Paid Time Off (PTO): 2 days PTO per month after successful completion of the 30?day trial period

Monthly KPI Bonuses: Performance-based incentives tied to account growth and productivity metrics

Career Growth: Long-term role with advancement opportunities



Working Schedule

Instagram SMM Shift: 7:00 AM – 3:00 PM (Manila time)

Workdays: 6 days per week

Daily Hours: 8 hours per day



Note: This position is open to applicants fro
tro Manila and nearby cities only.





Role Overview

We are looking for a dedicated Social Media Account Manager to join our growing agency. This role involves creating, growing, and managing multiple social media accounts across platforms including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts,
/Threads, and more. The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills, excellent English proficiency, and the ability to maintain consistent posting schedules across multiple accounts.



Key Responsibilities

- Create and manage social media accounts across multiple platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts,
/Threads, etc.)

- Develop and implement content posting strategies for each platform

- Maintain daily posting schedules across all managed accounts

- Understand and navigate platform-specific algorithms to maximize growth

- Monitor account performance and adjust strategies accordingly

- Maintain organized records of account credentials and performance metrics

- Ensure accounts appear authentic and follow natural growth patterns

- Implement best practices for account security and growth

- Capcut Editing Required





Technical Requirements

- Must have a personal computer, not shared with family or partners, dedicated to EMF work during shifts

- Computer must reliably support work tracking software (Gastime / DeskTime equivalent)

- Strong understanding of proxy usage for account management

- Reliable high-speed internet connection

- Back-up Internet for power outage or internet issues

- Basic troubleshooting abilities

- Experience with social media management tools

- Comfortable using CapCut for video editing (basic navigation and operations required)



Required Skills

- Excellent English proficiency (high B or C level)

- Proven experience managing multiple social media accounts

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Ability to work independently and maintain consistent productivity

- Technical aptitude with computers and mobile devices

- Reliability and punctuality in meeting posting schedules

- Experience with Apple products (MacBooks and iPhones)



Preferred Skills

- Previous experience in social media growth strategies

- Understanding of content curation and platform-specific best practices

- Familiarity with social media analytics

- Ability to adapt to changing platform guidelines and algorithms

- Experience managing multiple accounts simultaneously



Professional Development

- Comprehensive training in social media growth strategies, trends, and platform algorithms

- Hands-on experience with proven growth methods across multiple platforms

- Regular upskilling in emerging social media tools and practices

- Career Advancement Opportunities

title: Senior Telesales Manager (Build & Scale Function)
description:
Senior Telesales Manager (Build & Scale Function)

8-Figure D2C Supplement Brand

Remote | $2,000/month + Performance-Based Profit Share



About the Role



We are an established 8-figure D2C supplement brand launching our outbound telesales channel.

We are looking for a hands-on telesales leader who can build this function from scratch — hiring, structuring, training, and scaling a high-performing outbound team.



This is a build-phase leadership role with clear opportunity to grow into Head of Telesales as the team scales.



What You’ll Build

You will:

Hire and train an initial team of 3–5 telesales reps



Design outbound workflows for:

Abandoned cart recovery

Subscription conversion

Subscription reactivation

Cross-sell and upsell campaigns

Develop call scripts and objection frameworks

Implement performance tracking and QA systems

Collaborate with marketing to align messaging

Help select and implement dialer + CRM systems

Ensure ethical and compliant supplement sales practices





What Success Looks Like

First 90 Days:

Team hired and trained

Core workflows implemented

100+ daily calls running

5–8% abandoned cart conversion baseline





Months 4–6:

Scale to 8–10 reps

$50K+ monthly incremental revenue

10–12% abandoned cart conversion

15–20% subscription conversion from contacted one-time buyers





Months 7–12:

Team of 15+ reps with leadership layer

$150K+ monthly incremental revenue

Telesales contributing 10–15% of total company revenue





Required Experience (Non-Negotiable)

5+ years in telesales / outbound sales

2+ years leading a sales team

Experience building or restructuring outbound teams

Experience working with ecommerce or D2C brands

Strong understanding of KPIs (conversion rate, AOV, CAC, LTV)

Experience with CRM and auto-dialer systems

Data-driven and performance-oriented



Preferred:

Subscription business experience

Supplement / health product experience

Familiarity with compliance standards in regulated industries



What We’re Looking For

Builder mindset — comfortable creating systems from zero

Strong coach and performance manager

Ethical sales approach (no misleading health claims)

Results-driven and accountable for revenue targets

Collaborative with marketing and operations



Compensation

$2,000/month base

Performance-based profit share tied to telesales revenue



Fully remote





Why This Role Is Unique

You’re not inheriting a call center.



You’re building a revenue channel from the ground up inside a proven 8-figure brand with strong product-market fit.



If you’ve wanted ownership instead of just managing KPIs someone else built — this is that opportunity.



To apply, please send the following:



Updated Resume



Cover letter answering:

How you would build this from scratch

Conversion rates and revenue results achieved

Your philosophy on ethical selling in supplements



(Optional) Sample script or training document



Subject Line: Head of Telesales – [Your Name] or send your applications directly through this link:

title: Experienced Booker / Sales Representative
description:
We’re looking for an experienced booker or salesperson who is confident, organised, and comfortable having real conversations (not someone who relies heavily on scripts).



ABOUT US:



We are a mobile massage therapy business, providing professional massage services directly to clients in their homes, workplaces, and events. We focus on quality, trust, and genuine human connection, and we’re growing - which is why we’re looking for someone who can confidently represent our brand on the phone.



WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR:



Proven experience in sales or booking roles

High level of English (spoken and written)

Strong communication skills and confidence on calls

Organised, reliable, and able to manage follow-ups

Able to ad-lib naturally and sound human (not robotic or overly scripted)



ROLE DETAILS:



Expected calls: 50 calls per week

Working hours: 40 hours per month (approx. 8–10 hours per week)

Start date: 1st to 2nd Week of March



Contract: 3-month trial period

Opportunity to increase working hours based on performance



SALARY:

£200 per month

Payable via Wise



APPLICATION REQUIREMENT:



Please use “Application – Your Experienced Booker / Sales Representative” as your subject line.



In your job application
, please include:



Your updated CV / resume

A link to your 60-second voice note as if you were calling a company to introduce our corporate massage and wellbeing service. The voice recording must be recorded via Vocaroo.



This helps us assess your communication style, confidence, and ability to think on the spot.



If you’re confident on the phone, enjoy sales conversations, and want a flexible remote role with a growing wellness business, we’d love to hear from you.

 companies from provided contact lists

, and LinkedIn
