title: Web, Facebook, Google Business profile
description:
Build 1-Page Website +
 Business Page + Google Business Profile (Property Management Brand)



?



OVERVIEW



I own Crossword Realty, a small boutique property management and brokerage company in South Florida.



I am relaunching the property management side of the business.



I need:

 1. A clean, modern one-page website

 2.
 Business Page created and branded

 3. Google Business Profile created and optimized



This is a lean project.

No overbuilding.

No multi-page site.

No unnecessary features.



The goal is simple:



Generate 1–2 new landlord clients per month.



?



PROJECT SCOPE



1. ONE-PAGE WEBSITE



Platform:

Wix, Webflow, or similar (simple, mobile-first, fast loading).



Structure:



• Hero section

• Services

• Why Us

• Pricing

• Contact / CTA

• Calendly integration

• Simple contact form



No blog.

No tenant portal.

No property listings.



?



CREATIVE DIRECTION (Important)



Brand theme:

“Solving the property management puzzle.”



Hero Image Concept:



A well-dressed professional sitting beside a pool (NOT in the pool), at a small patio table, with a crossword puzzle book clearly visible on the table.



Mood:

• Calm

• Intelligent

• Composed

• Not flashy

• Not playful



The crossword puzzle theme must be subtle.

No cartoon graphics.

No bright puzzle icons.



Optional:

Very faint crossword grid texture in background (low opacity).



Color direction:

• Deep navy

• Warm ivory

• Muted gold or soft teal accents



The site should feel like:

Boutique law firm meets modern financial advisor.



?



2.
 BUSINESS PAGE



Create and set up:



• Branded cover image matching website theme

• Profile photo

• About section optimized for local SEO

• Services section filled out

• Contact info

• Link to website

• 3 initial posts written and scheduled



?



3. GOOGLE BUSINESS PROFILE



Create and optimize:



• Proper categories selected

• Services listed

• Business description optimized for:

 • Property management Broward

 • Property management Miami

• Photos uploaded

• Logo uploaded

• Business hours added

• Call tracking optional



?



DELIVERABLES



• Live functioning website

•
 Business Page published

• Google Business Profile live

• Admin access transferred to me

• All login credentials documented



?



BUDGET



Fixed project budget preferred.



Target range:

$150 – $300 total for entire project.



Please do not apply if you intend to upsell:

• Full branding packages

• SEO retainers

• Multi-page expansion

• Ongoing maintenance contracts



This is a lean launch project.



?



TIMELINE



Completion within 10–14 days.



?



IDEAL CANDIDATE



• Has built clean, modern real estate or professional service websites

• Understands minimalist design

• Understands mobile-first design

• Can follow creative direction

• Good English communication



Bonus if you:

• Have built Google Business Profiles before

• Understand local service businesses

• Have examples of simple high-converting landing pages



?



TO APPLY



Please send:

 1. 2–3 examples of simple one-page sites you built

 2. Confirmation you can create
 + Google Business Profile

 3. Your total fixed price

 4. Timeline

 5. Write the word “Crossword” at the top of your application so I know you read this fully



?



This is a straightforward project for someone experienced.



If this goes well, there may be future work for:

• Graphic updates

• Ongoing posting

• Paid ad setup



Looking forward to working with someone detail-oriented

title: Urgent Hiring: Technical Manager (Stone) – AutoCAD Specialist (Work From Home)
description:
[READ EVERYTHING] 

We are hiring one (1) senior Technical Manager – Stone to lead the technical coordination, detailing, and delivery of stone works for high-end interior fit-out projects.

This role requires deep expertise in stone systems, AutoCAD shop drawings, and cross-discipline coordination from design through installation.



How to Apply

All applicants must complete the application form below before applying on OnlineJobs.ph:



Applications submitted without a completed form will not be considered.



Key Responsibilities

• Lead and review stone shop drawings, slab layouts, and cut sheets using AutoCAD

• Translate design intent into fabrication- and installation-ready documentation

• Resolve complex stone detailing issues, including anchoring, joints, tolerances, and edge profiles

• Coordinate stone interfaces with joinery, MEP, structure, waterproofing, and finishes

• Manage RFIs, technical clarifications, and drawing revisions

• Support fabrication and site teams with sequencing, tolerances, and troubleshooting

• Maintain drawing standards, QA/QC procedures, and documentation logs



Requirements

• 40 years old and above

• Minimum 10 years of experience in stone fabrication, stone detailing, or fit-out technical management visible in the resume

• Expert-level proficiency in AutoCAD (mandatory)

• Strong knowledge of natural and engineered stone systems and installation methods

• Proven experience in high-end residential, hospitality, or commercial interior projects

• Overseas stone project experience required (Saudi Arabia experience is an advantage)

• Excellent coordination, documentation, and communication skills



Work Setup & Compensation

• Remote / Work From Home

• Initial 3-month trial period

• Monthly rate: Approx. USD 2,500 (subject to increase based on performance)

• Open to Filipino and non-Filipino applicants

• Immediate start upon selection

• Translate design intent into fabrication- and installation-ready documentation

• Resolve complex stone detailing issues, including anchoring, joints, tolerances, and edge profiles

• Coordinate stone interfaces with joinery, MEP, structure, waterproofing, and finishes

• Manage RFIs, technical clarifications, and drawing revisions

• Support fabrication and site teams with sequencing, tolerances, and troubleshooting

• Maintain drawing standards, QA/QC procedures, and documentation logs



Requirements

• 40 years old and above

• Minimum 10 years of experience in stone fabrication, stone detailing, or fit-out technical management visible in the resume.

• Expert-level proficiency in AutoCAD (mandatory)

• Strong knowledge of natural and engineered stone systems and installation methods

• Proven experience in high-end residential, hospitality, or commercial interior projects

• Overseas stone project experience required (Saudi Arabia experience is an advantage)

• Excellent coordination, documentation, and communication skills



Work Setup & Compensation

• Remote / Work From Home

• Initial 3-month trial period

• Monthly rate: Approx. USD 2,500 (subject to increase based on performance)

• Open to Filipino and non-Filipino applicants

• Immediate start upon selection

title: Junior Virtual Assistant (VA) / Junior Business Operations Assistant
description:
*** Please read through the entire post before applying.  Thanks! ***



Company Description

Engage Video Production (EVP) creates educational and communication focused video content, primarily for aerospace, defense, and technical clients. Our work helps high stakes organizations explain complex ideas clearly, train teams effectively, and communicate with absolute precision. We operate with a military grade standard of excellence and are looking for a Junior VA (Junior Business Operations Assistant) who is ready to grow within a high accountability environment.



The Three Pillars of Success at EVP

To succeed here, you must embody these three core values:



Discipline: You follow through on every task without "floundering" or ghosting. You possess the self-discipline to manage your time and meet deadlines without constant supervision.



Motivation and Dedication: You are dedicated to the mission and the company's growth. You don't just "do a job"; you look for ways to contribute to the overall success of the team.



Radical Integrity and Accountability: You own your mistakes immediately. You have the backbone to point out errors for correction, even if they are your own, because you understand that precision is non-negotiable.



*** Role Overview *** 

This is a "Junior Plus" role designed for someone who is not completely green but is looking to move toward a high level lead position. We invest in people who show discipline, but we have zero tolerance for lack of communication.



*** Core Responsibilities *** 

Data Management: Update and maintain Google Sheets with project tracking data.



Social Media Support: Basic scheduling and engagement via Meta Business Suite and LinkedIn.



Communication: Drafting clear, concise internal updates and client
s.



Administrative Support: Scheduling meetings, business organization tasks, coordinating with other members of the team/business.  May also include helping the team by organizing digital files and ensuring project folders meet our strict naming conventions.



*** Must-Have Technical Skills*** 

Google Workspace: High proficiency in Google Sheets (data entry and basic formulas) and
 communications.



Meta Business Suite: Experience scheduling posts and monitoring basic analytics (LinkedIn,
, Instagram).



English Fluency: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.



*** Compensation ***

Starting at: $250 (~14,500 PHP) to $350 (~20,000 PHP) USD per month, based on 20 hours/week, subject to change and operational demand. [*Conversions are approximate.]



Rate Determination: Starting salary within the ranges above is dependent upon experience and skill.



Schedule: Flexible, but requires a 2 hour overlap with US Central Time (CST) for sync meetings.  There are also responsiveness requirements for urgent issues/communications. 



A Note on AI and Judgment

At EVP, we use advanced tools every day. However, this role requires high level human judgment and Radical Integrity. We are hiring a human, not a prompt. If you use AI to draft your personal responses in the “How to Apply” section, you are failing the first test of this role: Honesty We want to hear your real thoughts and see your real personality to ensure you will be a good fit on our team. If your application lacks a unique human voice, it will be discarded. Use AI to assist your workflow later; do not use it to represent your character now.



*** How to Apply ***

To be considered, you must follow these steps exactly. Precision is a requirement for this role.



Subject Line - change it to: "Precision Assistant – [Your Name]".



-State the 10th word of our "Three Pillars" section.



-List three bullet points on why you are the right fit. Constraint: Do not use the words passionate, synergy, leverage, innovative, or dynamic.



-In two sentences, describe a specific time you had to fix a mistake you made. Use plain English. Do not use corporate jargon or AI generated "fluff."



-Attach or link to your CV/resume.  Must be in PDF format only.



-Want to really stand out? Record a 60-second video (Loom or similar) introducing yourself. Tell me why you are the right pick and what about Aerospace & Defense interests you. Start the video by addressing me by name (Ryan). Applicants who include this video move to the top of the list.



Thanks for your time and genuine interest!

title: Finance Support Officer (with Xero experience required)
description:
About You

You’re someone who brings positive energy to your work and enjoys being part of a collaborative, purpose-driven team. You’re friendly, approachable, and people feel comfortable coming to you with questions.



You care about doing things properly, you’re happy to jump in, help out, and figure things out as you go. You enjoy ticking things off a list, improving how things work, and knowing your work genuinely helps others.



Details

Reports to: Management Accountant

Employment Status: Full-time, permanent employee

Working Hours: AU Standard business hours and additional time as required by the role



Role Purpose

The Finance Support Officer is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of core transactional finance processes, including accounts payable, bank reconciliations, corporate cards, payroll processing, and financial data administration. This role is critical to the smooth running of the finance function, ensuring accurate, timely, high-quality financial processing that supports strong reporting, compliance, and organizational decision-making.



Role Responsibilities

A. Accounts Payable:

Process all supplier invoices, employee & volunteer expense claims, ensuring correct coding, approvals, GST treatment, currency, and documentation.

Manage the AP inbox and triage queries.

Maintain accurate supplier records, including bank details and documentation checks.

Prepare AP batches in line with cut-off timelines and approval workflows.

Conduct first-pass AP review before Management Accountant review (accuracy, completeness, coding).

Reconcile AP accounts and investigate variances.



B. Accounts Receivable:

Prepare and send invoices to partners, funders, and internal stakeholders.

Maintain AR schedules and follow up on outstanding amounts.

Reconcile AR balances and ensure all receipts are allocated.



C. Corporate Credit Cards:

Manage card issuance, cancellations, limits, and user onboarding.

Review monthly card claims, ensuring receipts, coding, and notes are provided.

Follow up late claims and unresolved discrepancies.

Reconcile company card accounts and ensure accurate EOM processing.



D. Payroll:

Prepare and process fortnightly payroll in line with contracts, and organisational policies.

Maintain employee master data with Xero, ensuring accuracy of bank details, tax information, superannuation, and entitlements.

Process new starters, changes, terminations, and pay adjustments.

Reconcile payroll reports, checking for variance and anomalies.

Prepare workpapers for superannuation payments, payroll journals, and leave reconciliations.

Work with P&E to ensure payroll accuracy, and timely updates to employee records.



E. Bank Reconciliation:

Complete daily and monthly bank reconciliations across all accounts.

Investigate and resolve unreconciled transactions.

Ensure all receipts, payments, and transfers are accurately recorded.



F. End of Month Processes:

Draft prepayments, accruals, apportionments, and routine journals.

Prepare EOM workpapers to a standard ready for first review.

Ensure all transactional processing is complete before close deadlines.

Maintain high-quality data hygiene to support forecasting, reporting, and analysis.



G. Data Entry and Record Keeping:

Maintain accurate, organised financial files and documentation for audit readiness.

Ensure data entry is correct, complete, and aligned with Orange Sky financial policies and accounting standards.

Support system updates, automation improvements, and process changes.



H. General Administrative Support:

Provide customer-focused support to internal stakeholders on finance and payroll queries.

Assist the Finance Team during peak periods (audit, EOFY, EOM, etc).

Participate in continuous improvement projects.

Contribute to team discussions on process optimisation, automation, and better ways of working.



Key Skills and Experience

-Experience in a finance support, accounts, or payroll role.

-Solid understanding of accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll processes.

-Proficient with Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets.

-Experience with accounting software (Xero preferred).

-Strong numeracy and data-entry accuracy.

-Understanding of basic accounting and payroll principles.

-High attention to detail and ability to deliver consistent accuracy.

-Excellent time management and ability to work to tight deadlines.

-Strong communication and customer service skills.

-Ability to work independently and take ownership of tasks.

-Comfortable with change, learning, and improving processes.

-Ability to handle confidential information with integrity and discretion.

-Certificate, Diploma, or Degree in Accounting, Finance, Business, or related field

title: Systems Architect & Automation Specialist
description:
Systems Architect & Automation Specialist

Luxury Photo Booth Operations | Orange County, CA



The Vision

We are an elite photo booth company in Orange County, providing high-end experiences for weddings, corporate galas, and luxury celebrations. We are transitioning from "manual growth" to "automated excellence."



We are looking for a Systems Architect to build a frictionless, high-converting backend. Your goal is to create a "hands-off" lead-to-event workflow that feels like a concierge service to the client while providing us with total data clarity.





The Core Objectives

1. The "Build-Your-Own" Interactive Experience

We want clients to visit our website and intuitively design their own custom photo booth package.

• Website Integration: Build/integrate an interactive package builder that allows clients to select their booth, backdrop, props, and add-ons.

• Dynamic Pricing: This tool must sync with our pricing logic and flow directly into HoneyBook.

• Inventory Logic: You will perform a full audit of our current assets (booths, printers, backdrops, etc.) and build an inventory management system within the CRM to prevent double-bookings or over-committing resources.

2. The "Golden Path" Workflow (HoneyBook)

Design a high-touch, automated sequence where the client is never left wondering "what’s next?"

• Inquiry ? Custom Quote: Based on their website selections.

• The Legal Lock: Implement a strict "Contract First" logic—the system must require a signature before the payment portal is unlocked.

• Automated Nurturing: Smart
 sequences for follow-ups, event prep, and post-event reviews.

• Pipeline Clarity: A visual stage-gate system: Inquiry ? Quote Sent ? Contract Pending ? Retainer Paid ? Fully Booked.

3. Data & Financial Command Center (Excel/Sheets)

Build a master dashboard that pulls data (via Zapier/Make) to track:

• Revenue Metrics: Monthly totals, deposit statuses, and outstanding balances.

• Inventory Performance: Which packages/add-ons are the most profitable?

• Sales Data: Lead sources and conversion rates.

4. Digital Asset Architecture (Google Drive)

Organize our digital life into a repeatable, scalable structure:

• Standardized event folders (Year > Date > Client).

• Centralized design asset library (Overlays, Logos, Templates).

• Standardized SOPs (Documentation) for how to maintain and scale the system.

The Ideal Candidate

• HoneyBook Power User: You have built complex "Smart Files" and automated workflows.

• Automation Expert: You are proficient in Zapier or 
 to bridge website forms, CRM data, and spreadsheets.

• Inventory Strategist: You understand how to organize physical assets into a digital tracking system.

• Luxury Mindset: You understand that "Automated" must not mean "Robotic." Every touchpoint must feel premium.

Timeline & Budget

• Build Phase: 3–4 weeks (Audit, Build, Automate).

• Testing Phase: 1–2 weeks (Bug testing & UI refinement).

• Budget: Please provide a fixed-price project bid or your hourly rate. We are looking for an expert, not a bargain.

How to Apply

Start your proposal with: “Streamlined System.”





Please include:

1. The "Package Builder" Solution: Briefly describe how you would build the "design your own package" feature on a website and link it to HoneyBook.

2. Portfolio: Examples of HoneyBook workflows or visual dashboards you’ve built.

3. Your Tech Stack: Which tools (Zapier, Make, etc.) do you recommend for this specific build?

4. Quote: Your estimated timeline and total project cost.

title: Senior SEO Specialist
description:
Senior SEO Specialist



Full-Time | Remote | Recruiting in Philippines

Australian-Based Award-Winning Digital Marketing Agency



About Us



We are an Australian-based, award-winning digital marketing agency specialising in PPC (Google Ads & Meta Ads) and CRO (Conversion Rate Optimisation).



Everything we do is built around two clear goals:



1. Help our clients generate more sales through smart, performance-driven marketing.

We use strategic paid media and conversion optimisation to drive measurable, scalable growth.



2. Produce award-level work that delivers real commercial impact.

From paid campaigns to organic search, our standard is simple — drive growth and create work we’re proud to win awards for.



We work across a wide range of industries including insurance, e-commerce, pizza franchises, florists, childcare centres, restaurants, trailers, containers, luxury accommodation, yachts, coaching businesses and more.



Although we are based in Australia, this is a full-time remote position being recruited in South Africa and the Philippines.



The Role



We are looking for a Senior SEO Specialist (5+ years’ experience) with a proven track record of delivering measurable organic growth that translates into real revenue.

This is not a role for someone who focuses on rankings alone.

We are looking for someone who understands that:



•	Rankings without traffic are meaningless

•	Traffic without conversions is vanity

•	SEO must generate measurable ROI



You will be accountable not just for ranking commercial keywords — but for driving qualified visitors and proving that the traffic generated produces leads and/or e-commerce sales.

If Google Ads dominates certain search results, you must know how to identify opportunities where organic traffic can still win and produce measurable commercial impact.



What Success Looks Like



Success in this role means:



•	Identifying revenue-driving keyword opportunities

•	Increasing qualified organic traffic

•	Improving rankings where real search demand exists

•	Demonstrating measurable ROI from SEO efforts

•	Contributing to increased leads and/or e-commerce revenue



We measure success by impact — not by activity.



Key Responsibilities



You will take full ownership of SEO strategy and implementation across our client portfolio.

On-Page SEO & Revenue-Focused Content



•	Conduct advanced keyword research focused on sales-driving intent

•	Identify high-impact keywords with real traffic potential

•	Avoid vanity rankings with no commercial value

•	Create and optimise high-quality, conversion-focused SEO content

•	Structure pages around search intent and conversion outcomes

•	Build strong internal linking strategies



Technical SEO



•	Conduct technical audits and resolve core issues

•	Improve crawlability, indexing, and site architecture

•	Optimise site speed and Core Web Vitals

•	Implement schema markup

•	Ensure technical health supports rankings and performance



Local SEO



•	Google Business Profile optimisation

•	Local search and map pack ranking improvements

•	Local citation strategy



AI & Modern Search Optimisation



•	Implement AI-informed optimisation strategies

•	Optimise for evolving AI-assisted search environments

•	Leverage AI tools responsibly to enhance productivity and results

•	Ensure social and content ecosystems support organic performance



You must be able to both develop strategy and execute implementation yourself.

We are not looking for someone who proposes ideas and blames others if results are not achieved.

We are looking for someone who takes ownership and proves performance.



Experience & Skills Required



•	5+ years of professional SEO experience

•	Proven track record of increasing rankings and qualified organic traffic

•	Clear evidence of SEO campaigns that generated measurable leads or revenue

•	Strong experience in on-page SEO and content creation

•	Deep understanding of technical SEO

•	Experience with Local SEO (Google Business Profile optimisation)

•	Strong commercial mindset — understands revenue impact

•	Experience using leading SEO tools (Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, etc.)

•	Ability to independently execute both strategy and implementation

You must be able to demonstrate past campaigns where SEO generated real ROI.



Accountability



You will be directly responsible for:

•	Increasing qualified organic traffic

•	Improving rankings for commercially valuable keywords with real search volume

•	Driving measurable growth in leads and/or e-commerce sales

•	Proving SEO ROI through data



We do not measure success by reports.

We measure success by results.



Who This Role Is For



This role is ideal for someone who:



•	Is commercially minded and ROI-focused

•	Has delivered proven SEO results in competitive markets

•	Can show real traffic growth that led to real revenue

•	Is a self-starter and works independently

•	Takes ownership of outcomes

•	Thrives in a performance-driven environment

•	Wants to contribute to an ambitious, award-winning agency

You should want to be known for delivering exceptional SEO performance — not just activity.



Who This Role Is Not For



This role is not suitable for someone who:



•	Focuses only on rankings without traffic

•	Cannot prove measurable results

•	Is still learning SEO fundamentals

•	Relies on others to implement strategy

•	Blames external factors for poor performance

•	Treats remote work casually

•	Is looking for a part-time or secondary income role



We are not looking for someone to “learn on our clients.”

We are looking for someone who already knows how to deliver measurable growth.



What You’ll Gain



•	Full-time remote flexibility

•	Exposure to diverse and competitive industries

•	Opportunity to deliver high-level SEO within a performance-driven agency

•	Work alongside PPC and CRO specialists

•	A results-focused, ambitious environment

•	The chance to build a reputation for measurable SEO excellence



How to Apply

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe : Office Admin Role for E-Commerce ! Join the Beat !
description:
- Recruitment validity period: Until 3 business days from the date of the first recruitment announcement

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a “Full-Time” Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Sales & Marketing

You will be responsible for studying and trying how to gain traffics to our shopping mall. Active working on research articles related to SEO, social marketing and finding where and how to promote our shopping mall is required.

4. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

* ONLY Looking for a full time employee

* $300~$400/mo. determined based on the candidate’s skills, experience, and overall evaluation relative to other applicants

* One-year renewable Contract

- Compensation and terms may be adjusted based on attendance, teamwork, and performance.

- Exceptional performers may be considered for early renewal or adjustment. (multiple successful cases)

* 6-month probationary period with possibility of early conversion to regular position based on performance (multiple successful cases)



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

3. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year’s Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

4. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1-Year Service / 3-Year Service / 5-Year Service



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

Summitree

title: Sr. Email & Launch Copywriting Specialist
description:
About Us

We’re a fast-growing education company serving experienced software engineers who want real-world Rust skills and real career outcomes. Our flagship offers are mentor-led, cohort-based programs focused on shipping production-grade projects and landing Rust-heavy roles.



 is one of our main revenue channels. We use it to fill cohorts, book sales calls, and reactivate our warm audience. We’re hiring someone to own this function end-to-end.



Role Overview

You will own the strategy, copy, and execution of
 campaigns that drive launches, bookings, reactivations, and long-term revenue from our list. This is a senior, full-time role for someone who wants clear ownership, measurable impact, and a long-term seat on the team.



You are not “writing some
s.” You are building a repeatable
 machine that keeps our calendar full and our cohorts sold out.



What You’ll Own

1. Launch Campaigns (Cohorts & Fast-Cash Promos)

Plan and write complete launch sequences for our cohorts and promo offers (pre-launch, open cart, objections, FAQ, deadline, last call, sold-out, etc.).

Standardize, document, and templatize launches so they’re easy to clone and improve.



2. Evergreen Nurture & Segmentation

Build and maintain evergreen sequences that warm new subscribers and move them toward a call or application.

Segment based on behavior and stage (new leads, engaged, inactive, past applicants, buyers) so people get the right messages at the right time.



3. Show-Up & No-Show Sequences

Write and optimize sequences that increase show-up rates for booked calls.

Create follow-up for no-shows and no-buys to recover missed revenue and keep good leads in motion.



4. Reactivation Campaigns

Run quarterly reactivation campaigns for cold or inactive subscribers to generate “found” revenue from the list.



What Success Looks Like in the First 90 Days

- 3 complete launch sequences live, documented, and reusable.

- 1 evergreen nurture sequence live, for new leads.

- Show-up rate on
-sourced calls improved vs. baseline.

- At least 1 reactivation campaign shipped with clear revenue attribution.

- Clear
 playbook (templates, frameworks, naming) the team can understand and reuse.



Requirements

- 3+ years professional B2C
 copy experience.

- Proven track record owning full launch/email sequences (not just individual
s).

- Strong understanding of offer positioning, sequencing, and deadlines for high-ticket educational or coaching products.

- Ability to write in a clear, human voice that resonates with senior, technical audiences.

- Comfortable with at least 3-hour overlap with US pacific time zone, async with a distributed team, and being accountable to numbers (revenue, bookings, show rates).



Bonus

- Experience with technical or software developer audiences.

- Familiarity with platforms like Kartra, ActiveCampaign, or similar.

- Comfortable pulling basic numbers from dashboards/CRMs to see what’s working.



How to Apply

In your application, include:

- A brief personal intro (2–5 short sentences) in your own words.

- 1–2 examples of launch or promo sequences you’ve written (cohort, course, or high-ticket offers).

- A short note explaining how you approach writing launch
s for a high-ticket cohort program.

- Your monthly salary expectation in USD (full-time) and your official
 address.



Application Question (Required):

1. Which part of the
 lifecycle do you enjoy owning most? (launches, nurture, reactivation, post-purchase, etc.) What
 platforms have you worked in?

2. Briefly describe one launch
 sequence you’ve owned end-to-end.

3. In 5–7 bullet points, outline:

- the audience

- the goal of the sequence

- how you structured the sequence (early ? middle ? final
s)

- one decision you made to avoid audience fatigue



Applications that skip any of the above will not be considered.

title: Marketing Coordinator (Client)
description:
POSITION PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES

The primary responsibility for this position is to plan, execute, and manage the company’s marketing initiatives 

end-to-end, with a strong focus on CRM management, content creation, and digital marketing. This role ensures 

that marketing campaigns are effective, timely, and aligned with the company’s strategic objectives. The 

Marketing Coordinator will also assist with administrative tasks when marketing workload is light, contributing 

to the overall efficiency of business operations.



This role is responsible for, but not limited to:

1. Overseeing and managing all marketing initiatives from start to finish.

2. Managing and optimising the company’s CRM system to support marketing and sales activities.

3. Creating compelling content across multiple channels including
s, blogs, and social media.

4. Assisting with SEO, analytics, and marketing reporting to improve campaign performance.

5. Supporting the development of marketing automation within the CRM.

6. Providing design support for marketing materials and campaigns as required.

7. Undertaking general administrative tasks when marketing workload is low.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES

• Set up, manage, and maintain the CRM system for marketing and sales purposes.

• Plan, execute, and manage marketing campaigns and initiatives end-to-end.

• Develop and execute
 marketing campaigns (EDMs) using CRM and
 platforms.

• Write engaging copy for blogs, newsletters, social media, and other marketing channels.

• Optimise content for SEO and monitor performance using analytics tools such as Google Analytics.

• Assist with creating marketing graphics, layouts, and visual content where needed.

• Build and manage CRM automations to streamline marketing workflows and client engagement.

• Monitor marketing campaign performance, prepare reports, and recommend improvements.

• Identify new marketing opportunities and independently drive initiatives to completion.

• Undertake general admin tasks to assist the wider team during low marketing periods.

• Maintain accurate records of marketing activities, assets, and campaigns.



KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, AND ABILITIES

• Proven ability to manage marketing initiatives independently from start to finish.

• Experience in CRM management, marketing automation, and data-driven marketing.

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with strong copywriting ability.

• Knowledge of SEO best practices and content optimisation.

  Experience with Google Analytics or other marketing analytics tools.

• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and Google Workspace cloudbased tools.

• Familiarity with graphic design tools like Canva is desirable.

• Experience with Asana or similar project management tools is ideal.

• Organised and detail-oriented, able to manage multiple priorities under pressure.

• Problem-solving mindset with the ability to work independently and collaboratively.

• Tech-savvy with the ability to quickly learn and adopt new digital tools.

• Strong project management and organisational skills.

• Professional attitude and ability to communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.



GENERAL RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES

• Uphold company values, policies, and professional standards in all work.

• Maintain confidentiality of marketing strategies, client data, and internal information.

• Support the team with ad hoc tasks to ensure smooth workflow across the business.

• Maintain an organised and efficient digital and physical workspace.

• Continuously seek opportunities to improve marketing processes and systems.

• Contribute to a positive and collaborative team culture

title: Part-Time Partnerships & Development Virtual Assistant (Nonprofit Growth Role)
description:
About Blount Beginnings



Blount Beginnings Inc. is a U.S.-based nonprofit organization focused on helping individuals stabilize their lives through housing support, workforce development, and employment readiness programs.



We work directly with people experiencing homelessness, returning from incarceration, or rebuilding after difficult life circumstances. Our partnerships with employers, churches, financial institutions, and community organizations help individuals regain independence and long-term stability.



We are a growing organization based in the Southern United States where relationships matter, people come first, and professionalism is grounded in kindness and respect.



We are building a remote team to grow alongside us as we expand into additional communities.



?



Important — Please Read Carefully



This is not a high-pressure sales role.



We are not looking for someone aggressive or transactional.



We are looking for someone who understands how to:

 • build trust

 • communicate warmly and professionally

 • connect with people from different backgrounds

 • represent an organization that serves real human needs



If you naturally enjoy building relationships and making people feel comfortable, you will do well here.



?



Position Overview



The Partnerships & Development Virtual Assistant helps expand our organizational reach by supporting outreach efforts, identifying partnership opportunities, and assisting with grant and funding research.



Your role helps ensure opportunities are discovered, organized, and moved forward consistently.



?



Responsibilities



Partnership Outreach

 • Research churches, employers, foundations, and community partners

 • Maintain partnership tracking lists

 • Send professional outreach
s

 • Conduct respectful follow-ups

 • Schedule meetings with leadership



?



Grant Research Support

 • Identify relevant grant opportunities

 • Track deadlines and requirements

 • Assist with application preparation

 • Organize supporting documents



(Grant experience is helpful but not required.)



?



Organizational Support

 • Maintain outreach databases

 • Track communication history

 • Assist with coordination of meetings and initiatives



?



Ideal Candidate



You may be a strong fit if you:

 • Communicate naturally and professionally

 • Enjoy helping people feel heard and respected

 • Work well without constant supervision

 • Are organized and dependable

 • Prefer relationship-building over selling

 • Are comfortable working in a growing organization



?



Required Skills

 • Strong written English

 • Professional communication style

 • Google Workspace experience

 • Reliable internet connection

 • Ability to manage multiple priorities



Compensation



Weekly compensation provided.



Tea
mbers contributing to successful funding or partnership growth may be eligible for performance-based incentives aligned with organizational success.



IMPORTANT APPLICATION INSTRUCTION



To confirm you carefully read this posting:



Start your application message with the phrase:



“People matter first.”



Applications without this phrase will not be reviewed.



Also include:

 1. A short paragraph describing a time you built trust with someone professionally.

 2. Confirmation you are available during EST hours.



Why Join Us?



You will help an organization that directly impacts real lives while growing professionally alongside leadership as we expand into new cities.



We are looking for someone who wants to grow with an organization not just complete tasks.

title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant / Transaction Coordinator (Singapore Market)
description:
Hi, I’m Dominic, a Singapore-based real estate consultant.



I’m looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant / Transaction Coordinator to help manage the backend of my real estate business so I can focus on serving clients and closing deals.



This is a long-term position for someone who wants stability and growth.



Main Responsibilities

You will assist with:

- Coordinating property viewings (liaising with clients, agents, tenants and sellers)

- Calling to arrange and confirm appointments (this is coordination, not cold calling or sales)

- Following up with buyers and sellers via WhatsApp and

- Preparing and submitting paperwork (OTP, checklists, transaction documents)

- Tracking timelines and ensuring smooth transaction progress

- Updating CRM and maintaining lead records

- Organising Google Drive files and documentation

- Assisting with listing uploads and simple Canva edits (bonus)

- General administrative support



You will not be required to do sales prospecting or cold calling.



Who I’m Looking For



You are:

- Highly organised and detail-oriented

- Proactive and able to think ahead

- Clear and confident in spoken and written English

- Comfortable making professional coordination calls

- Experienced in admin support or transaction coordination

- Calm and reliable under pressure

- Tech-savy (Google Drive, Sheets, Docs, WhatsApp Web, CRM systems)



Bonus if you have:

- Real estate experience (any country)

- Experience handling property transactions

- Social media scheduling experience



Working Hours

Preferred:

Singapore Time (GMT+8) with at least 4–6 hours daily overlap

Part-time or full-time (to be discussed)



Salary

- To be discussed based on experience and skill level.

- Performance-based bonuses may be provided.



Growth Opportunity

- This is not just a task-based VA role.

- If you perform well, you will grow with the business and take on more responsibility over time (operations management, marketing coordination, process improvement).



I value long-term working relationships.



To Apply (Important)



Please send:

- A short introduction about yourself

- Your previous experience (especially admin or real estate-related work)

- Your expected monthly salary

- The word “HORSE” in your subject line (so I know you read everything)

- How would you handle a situation where a client stops responding before a scheduled viewing?



Applications without the word “HORSE” will not be reviewed.



If you are dependable, organised, and looking for long-term growth with a serious real estate business, I look forward to hearing from you.



— Dominic

title: ARCHICAD EXPERT REQUIRED
description:
Join Our Team: ARCHICAD EXPERT REQUIRED - NO AUTOCAD 

ONLY SERIOUS APPLICANTS - PLEASE SEE THE HIRING PROCESS - ONLY APPLY IF YOU CAN GO THROUGH THE PROCESS.

Do you excel in using ArchiCAD to create precise and detailed drafts and models ?

If so, we're looking for someone just like you to join our dynamic team!



**About Us:**

At Sachdeva Architects, we're passionate about transforming visions into reality. We specialize in creating awe-inspiring architectural designs that leave a lasting impression. Our projects range from residential masterpieces to commercial marvels, and we pride ourselves on delivering innovative solutions that exceed expectations.



Role and Responsibilities

ArchiCAD Drafting Expert, you will play a pivotal role in turning our architectural concepts into tangible visual representations. Your responsibilities will include:



ArchiCAD Drafting: using ArchiCAD 24 to produce accurate and detailed drafts, blueprints, and schematics that form the basis for construction and realisation of projects.



Collaboration: Work closely with architects, designers, and project managers to understand design objectives and translate them into compelling visual assets.



Innovation: Stay updated on industry trends and technological advancements to bring fresh ideas and techniques to our rendering and drafting processes.



Qualifications:

To succeed in this role, you should possess:



- Extensive experience with ArchiCAD software for drafting and design purposes.



- A strong portfolio showcasing your ArchiCAD drafting capabilities.



- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics, ensuring that every design element is accurately represented.



- Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively within a team environment.



- Problem-solving abilities to address challenges and provide innovative solutions.



**How to Apply:**

If you're excited to be a part of our creative journey and have the skills to match, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your experience in ArchiCAD drafting to using this portal. Feel free to include any relevant project examples that highlight your expertise.

The hiring will be in 3 steps.

1- Video Interview.

2- We will conduct a test to know your skills and access your performance based on the test using Archicad as a drafting tool for a residential project. 

3- Test review and final interview. We will conduct a final interview to discuss the contract and company policies.



**Benefits:**

We value our tea
mbers and offer a range of benefits, including:



- Competitive salary and opportunities for growth.

- A collaborative and inspiring work environment.

- Access to cutting-edge technology and resources.

- Recognition for your contributions to our success.



Join us in shaping the future of architecture through your exceptional ArchiCAD drafting skills.

title: Personal Credit Repair Specialist (Advanced – US Credit Expert Only)
description:
About the Role



We are hiring an experienced U.S. Credit Repair Specialist to actively manage and optimize two personal credit profiles.



This is NOT a beginner role. We are looking for someone who already understands real credit repair strategy — not just sending template disputes.



Your goal is to help move already-good credit into the excellent tier (740–800+) through intelligent optimization, dispute strategy, and credit structure planning.



?



Current Situation



You will work with two established credit files:



Profile A

 • FICO ~700

 • Strong accounts with some historical late payments

 • No collections

 • Needs optimization + targeted dispute strategy



Profile B

 • FICO ~688–730 range

 • Mostly positive history

 • Minor negative marks

 • Goal: reach top-tier credit



This is optimization and precision work — not basic repair.



?



Your Responsibilities



You will:

 • Perform full credit analysis (Experian, Equifax, TransUnion)

 • Identify legally disputable items

 • Draft custom dispute and goodwill letters

 • Manage bureau disputes and follow-ups

 • Track dispute cycles and results

 • Recommend utilization and payment timing strategies

 • Advise on account positioning (AU accounts, balances, limits)

 • Create monthly progress reports

 • Recommend next-step credit actions



?



Required Experience (Must Have)



? 2+ years working with U.S.-based credit repair clients

? Deep understanding of:

 • FICO scoring factors

 • Late payment removal strategies

 • Goodwill adjustment requests

 • Credit utilization optimization

 • Authorized user strategy

 • Credit bureau dispute workflows

 • Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) basics



? Excellent written English

? Extremely detail oriented



?



DO NOT APPLY IF



? You only send template dispute letters

? You have no real U.S. credit experience

? You rely only on automated software without analysis

? You are an agency



?



Preferred (Big Bonus)

 • Credit Repair Cloud experience

 • Knowledge of Metro 2 reporting

 • Experience raising scores from 650–720 ? 780+

 • Financial or lending background



?



Work Details

 • Remote (Philippines preferred)

 • 5–10 hours per week initially

 • Long-term role if results are strong

 • Flexible hours

 • Direct communication with owner



?



Compensation

 • Hourly or fixed monthly (based on experience)

 • Performance bonuses possible for measurable score improvements



?



Application Instructions



To apply, include:

 1. Your experience with U.S. credit repair

 2. Example credit score improvements you achieved

 3. Your dispute process (brief explanation)

 4. Tools/software you use

 5. Your hourly rate

 6. Start your message with the word “OPTIMIZE”



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.



?



? Hiring Goal



We want a long-term specialist who can become our go-to credit advisor as we expand into business credit and lending preparation.

title: Client Success Manager (Leadership Role) — 100% Remote, Global Clients
description:
CLIENT SUCCESS MANAGER (LEADERSHIP ROLE): 100% REMOTE, FLEXIBLE HOURS, GLOBAL TEAM



WHO WE ARE:



We’re Trialfacts. We connect patients to clinical trials, and our clients rely on us to deliver results, transparency, and confidence throughout their studies. Our leadership team plays a critical role in shaping how we serve clients, collaborate internally, and grow sustainably.



YOUR JOB:



As Client Success Manager, you are a senior, client-facing leader and a core member of the Trialfacts Leadership Team. You own client outcomes end-to-end across active clients in the US and Australia, leading the team responsible for delivery, expectation-setting, escalation management, and internal coordination.



This is not a reactive support role. You set direction, guide teams, and work proactively with clients to drive strong outcomes, consistency, and trust.



You’ll work closely with Sales, Operations, Tech, and Leadership to ensure delivery quality, retention, and long-term client success.



SUPPORT THAT HELPS YOU THRIVE:



Competitive compensation – Stable and above-market monthly pay

Unlimited PTO you’ll actually use – Take paid leave whenever you choose.

Real flexibility – Work from anywhere and thrive in an async-first culture.

Paid learning and growth – We cover courses, books, and hands-on learning so you can keep building real, in-demand tech skills.



YOU'RE A STRONG FIT IF YOU BRING:



Proactive Client Success Leadership – You’ve owned client outcomes end-to-end, led client-facing teams, and partnered proactively with clients across complex accounts in a cross-functional, remote environment.



Trusted Advisor, Not Order-Taker – You’ve used judgment and expertise to guide clients toward effective approaches, rather than simply executing requests.



Strategic Client Mindset – You think beyond day-to-day delivery, prioritize based on impact, and confidently deprioritize low-value or high-visibility work when needed.



People Leadership Capability – You’ve developed talent through coaching and delegation, set clear expectations, and hold teams accountable for results.



Impact-Based and Client-Centric Approach – You’ve prioritized decisions based on client impact and measurable outcomes across delivery, prioritization, escalation, and resourcing decisions, clearly explaining trade-offs and escalating early to protect 

results.



Cross-functional alignment – You’ve aligned multiple internal teams around shared priorities, roles, and outcomes to drive coordinated execution.



Data-Driven Performance Management –You’ve delivered consistent KPI outcomes (such as client satisfaction, delivery pace, or retention) through disciplined execution and clear processes.



Clear, Executive-level Communication – You communicate priorities, decisions, and changes clearly with both clients and internal stakeholders, reducing errors and rework.



Quality, Reliability, and Trust– You’ve maintained high delivery standards, accuracy, and data integrity even during periods of change or pressure.



Scalable Remote Leadership – You’ve managed team capacity and concerns effectively in a remote, cross-cultural environment, sustaining performance without quality degradation.



Proactive Issue and Risk Management –You’ve anticipated risks, surfaces issues early, addresses them decisively with clear ownership, and seeks the right support when needed to protect client outcomes.



READY TO STEP INTO THIS ROLE?

If this role feels like the right fit, we’d love to hear from you. Applications accepted here:

title: Client Success Specialist (Remote, Forever) | Advance Global Medical Research
description:
CLIENT SUCCESS SPECIALIST WANTED: SHAPE THE FUTURE OF MEDICAL RESEARCH



-100% remote, forever

-Unlimited paid leave



Hello—we’re Trialfacts, a remote, entrepreneurial company at the forefront of advancing health research. We’re looking for a CLIENT SUCCESS SPECIALIST to help our clients successfully recruit participants for their clinical trials. If you’re a relationship-builder with strong organizational and analytical skills, and you thrive in a proactive, forward-thinking, and fast-paced remote environment, this role is for you.



YOUR ROLE:



CLIENT ONBOARDING & SUPPORT: Guide new clients through our onboarding process, ensuring they feel confident using our systems and understand how we help them reach their goals.

ENROLLMENT SUCCESS: Take initiative to proactively monitor client projects, develop strategies to ensure enrollment targets are met, and swiftly address any roadblocks along the way.

CLIENT RETENTION AND REFERRALS: Build strong relationships with clients by delivering anticipatory and exceptional service that encourages repeat business and enthusiastic referrals.

COMMUNICATION: Maintain clear, timely, and proactive communication that not only keeps clients informed but also anticipates their needs  and ensures projects stay on track.

QUALITY AND COMPLIANCE: Ensure quality standards are met and client and participant data are handled securely, in line with privacy regulations.



WHAT WE OFFER:



AUTONOMY & FLEXIBILITY: Set your own hours depending on what works best for our clients, enjoy unlimited paid holidays, and work from anywhere with a good internet connection.

INNOVATION & IMPACT: Work with research teams driving significant advancements in medical research from organizations like AstraZeneca, Harvard, Stanford, and many more.

GROWTH AND LEARNING: Opportunities for professional development, with access to courses and training programs.

REWARDING CAREER: Contribute meaningfully to the world of health research and share in the success of Trialfacts.



THIS POSITION IS IDEAL FOR YOU IF YOU:



ARE CLIENT FOCUSED: You thrive on understanding client needs and go the extra mile to anticipate and address them early.

EXCEL AT BUILDING RELATIONSHIPS: You naturally develop trust and rapport with clients, encouraging repeat business and referrals.

ARE A PROACTIVE PROBLEM SOLVER: You tackle challenges head-on, always looking for solutions that keep client projects moving forward and prevent issues before they arise.

ARE A STRATEGIC THINKER: You can review data and information, conduct root cause analyses, and resolve problems with mitigative and corrective strategies.

COMMUNICATE CLEARLY AND EFFECTIVELY: You’re skilled in both written and verbal communication, adapting your style to suit different audiences.

ARE ORGANISED AND DETAIL-ORIENTED: You juggle multiple priorities with ease, ensuring nothing slips through the cracks.

UNDERSTAND THE IMPORTANT OF DATA PRIVACY: You’re conscientious about handling sensitive information and complying with privacy standards.



INTERESTED IN JOINING US?

If this position aligns with your career aspirations and skills, we would love to hear from you. Apply here:

title: Technical Executor — Institutional Manual Formatting (29,000 words)
description:
Project: The Secure Estate — Standalone Tactical Manual

Type: Contract 

Location: Remote

Project Overview

We are seeking a precision-focused Technical Executor for a 29,000-word manual, The Secure Estate. This is NOT a creative or content-creation job — it is a Systemic Formatting & Layout project. The contractor will implement the fully populated manual according to our strict Institutional Minimalism style guide.

The work involves layout, table integration, technical ledger formatting, SLI dashboards, and “Closed-Loop” drill boxes.

Important: All materials are proprietary. Absolute confidentiality is required.

Key Requirements

Strict adherence to the Institutional Minimalism style guide:

High-contrast, tactical visual hierarchy

No self-help or creative flourishes

Drill boxes, table formatting, and SLI dashboards implemented exactly as instructed

Proven experience with Adobe InDesign or Affinity Publisher

Ability to handle complex technical tables, drills, and dashboards

Attention to detail and operational precision

Phase 1 NDA/NCC must be signed prior to project start

Mandatory Triage Question

When applying, include the exact statement:

“I have confirmed the Institutional Minimalism requirement and understand that I am not to alter the operational logic of the HEIR/ASSET/ESTATE framework.”

Applications without this statement will not be considered.

Deliverables

Fully formatted manuscript (Chapters 1–5) per provided assets

KDP-ready PDF

Editable source files (InDesign or Affinity Publisher)

All tables, dashboards, and Closed-Loop drill boxes implemented per style guide

Completed Technical Ledger visualization ready for import

Timeline: 10 days from project start

Additional Notes

Contractor will not generate content or modify operational logic.

All SLI scores, breach counts, extraction deadlines, and Vault/Courtyard/Street references are pre-populated and fixed.

Contractor may adjust layout for readability, table widths, or callout placement, but data, logic, and content remain immutable.

All Phase 1 access documents (NDA/NCC, style guides, and assets) must be acknowledged and signed prior to access.

title: Full-Time YouTube Video Editor Wanted

We’re looking for dedicated full-time editors who want to grow with us long-term and help create high-retention, engaging content for millions of viewers worldwide.



???? Your Role



Edit YouTube videos (8–15 mins) in a live-lesson style format.



Focus on pacing, storytelling, and retention — every cut must keep viewers watching.



Work closely with our coaches and team to ensure videos deliver both clarity and entertainment.



Deliver at least 8 completed videos per month (with opportunities to take on more).

title: Social Media Manager
description:

We are looking for a dedicated Social Media Account Manager to join our growing agency. This role involves creating, growing, and managing multiple social media accounts across platforms including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts,
/Threads, and more. The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills, excellent English proficiency, and the ability to maintain consistent posting schedules across multiple accounts.

Professional Development

- Career Advancement Opportunities

title: Job Title: Admin & Division Operations Support
description:
We are hiring a full-time Admin VA to support our National Division Organiser. Your main responsibility will be reading incoming correspondence, summarising key information and turning it into clear action items. You must be able to identify tasks, flag urgent matters and ensure follow-ups are tracked properly.

 

You will work with spreadsheets daily to track division rollout progress, performance metrics and operational updates. Accuracy is critical. You will also update our website with current local divisional information, ensuring details are correct and consistent.

 

This role requires someone organised, proactive and comfortable working within a cross-trained team. You will collate information from multiple stakeholders, follow up when needed and help keep projects moving.

 

Strong written English, solid spreadsheet skills and experience with website or CMS updates are preferred. You must have a stable, fast internet connection and be available full-time Monday to Friday.

title: Real Estate Cold Caller

***Specifically real estate cold calling experience required. If you don't have it, please don't waste time applying.





Who We Are:

High-performance real estate investment company seeking a cold caller/acquisition specialist who thrives in a systemized, metrics-driven environment.

If you can’t handle daily tracking, clear quotas, strict process, and real consequences—you will not last here.









What You’ll Do:

Make 100+ outbound calls daily to property owners and motivated seller lists using our scripts and dialers.



Qualify leads, set appointments, and advance prospects through our defined sales process—no improvising.



Log every activity in our CRM and submit a daily scorecard—no exceptions.



Handle objections professionally and convert “no” into opportunity, always within our guidelines.



We useOpenPhone and Aircall.







What Success Looks Like:

5+ qualified leads generated daily

100?herence to scripts, CRM tracking, and process



High call volume history (100+ calls/day in previous roles)



Comfort with accountability.



Experience using sales dialers and CRMs—no learning curve.



Fluency in English; accent must be clear and build rapport with U.S. sellers

Top performers who consistently deliver strong results and exceed all key metrics will be eligible for a commission increase of up to 5% of net profits per deal.

title: Video Editor (Long-Form & Short-Form Content)
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



About the Role:



We are seeking a versatile Video Editor skilled in producing both long-form content (YouTube

faceless videos, luxury watch tour videos) and short-form content (TikTok, Instagram Reels,

YouTube Shorts). You will transform raw footage into polished, engaging videos optimized for

each platform while maintaining consistent branding, pacing, and storytelling quality.



Key Responsibilities:



Editing & Post-Production

- Edit long-form videos for YouTube, including faceless content and high-quality luxury

watch tour videos.

- Create short-form videos such as TikToks, Reels, YouTube Shorts, and other social clips.

- Repurpose long-form videos into short, engaging bite-sized content.

- Add motion graphics, subtitles, transitions, animations, SFX, and music.

- Perform color correction, grading, audio clean-up, and overall quality refinement.

Creative & Strategy

- Collaborate with creative leads to understand briefs, objectives, and desired outcomes.

- Craft compelling narratives, pacing, and visual storytelling across all formats.

- Optimize content for platform-specific best practices (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram,

, etc.).

- Contribute creative ideas for content themes, visual direction, and storytelling approach.

Workflow & Asset Management

- Organize and maintain all media assets, project files, and working libraries.

- Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.

- Export and deliver videos in various formats, resolutions, and aspect ratios depending on

platform needs.



Requirements:



- Proven experience editing both long-form and short-form content (portfolio or demo reel

required).

- Proficiency in at least one major editing software: Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro,

DaVinci Resolve, or After Effects.

- Strong understanding of pacing, storytelling, rhythm, and audience retention strategies.

- Experience creating platform-optimized content for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram Reels,

and Shorts.

- Ability to maintain consistent branding and visual style across various content types.

- Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail.

- Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.

- Comfortable using AI tools for editing and content generation

- Thumbnail creation and basic graphic design



Preferred Qualifications

- Experience with motion graphics and basic animation.

- Understanding of content analytics, audience retention data, and platform algorithms.

description:

Hi! My name is Wilson, and I run a business dedicated to helping people shop for and learn about luxury watches.



If you’re passionate about watches — their design, history, and the stories they tell — and you love writing, this is an exciting opportunity to combine both passions.



What You’ll Do

As our Content Writing Specialist, you will:



Research luxury watch topics, from brand histories (Rolex, Omega, Audemars Piguet, etc.) to technical features, buying guides, and market trends.

Create high-quality, original content for our website, blog, social media,
 newsletters, and other marketing channels.

Edit and proofread to ensure clarity, accuracy, and consistency in brand voice.

Collaborate with the team to plan content calendars and develop new content ideas.

Optimize all content for SEO, ensuring it ranks well on search engines and attracts organic traffic.

Stay up-to-date with watch industry news and SEO best practices, constantly bringing fresh ideas to the table.



You’re a Great Fit If You:

Have a genuine love for watches, luxury goods, or horology.

Have proven experience as a content writer, copywriter, or in a similar role.

Have strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills — you know how to captivate and inform.

Are skilled in SEO best practices, including keyword research and content optimization.

Are great at conducting in-depth research and translating technical details into engaging, reader-friendly content.

Are familiar with content management systems (WordPress preferred) and basic HTML (a plus).

Are independent, detail-oriented, and able to meet tight deadlines.

Have a portfolio showcasing your writing skills (bonus if it includes watch-related pieces).



Why You’ll Love Working With Us

Competitive pay plan.

Very flexible work schedule — work when and where you do your best writing.

Supportive environment that values creativity, growth, and your love of watches.

Opportunities to build a personal voice and authority in the luxury watch space.

title: Social Media Shopper for Luxury Watches
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “How to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions—key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



Browse. Discover. Hunt for hidden watch deals.

(No set hours. Total freedom. Serious fun.)



Do you love scrolling through social media and online marketplaces?

Are you obsessed with finding rare gems and scoring amazing deals?

Do you think watches are fascinating — or just plain beautiful?



If you just shouted “YES!”, this might be your dream gig.



About Me

Hi! I’m Wilson. I run a business dedicated to collecting, trading, and selling luxury watches and timepieces. Every day, I’m on the hunt for rare, underpriced, and unique watches — but the internet is huge, and I can’t do it alone.



That’s where you come in. You’ll be my eyes and ears online, helping me discover the next big score.



What You’ll Do

Scan
 groups, marketplaces, Instagram, and other online platforms for watch listings.

Identify undervalued or rare timepieces (don’t worry — I’ll train you to spot them).

Enter potential deals into a Google Sheet with a built-in calculator to evaluate value.

Help grow our collection of rare, desirable watches.



Why You’ll Love This

Total freedom — work anytime, anywhere. No fixed hours.

Paid to scroll — get paid to do what you already love on your phone or laptop.

Hands-on mentorship — learn directly fro
 how to spot high-value deals and develop an investor’s eye.

Niche, valuable skills — gain knowledge about watches, deal analysis, and market trends.

Fun & flexible — perfect for curious minds, treasure hunters, and explorers.



You’re a Great Fit If You:

Love browsing online for interesting items.

Have a sharp eye for detail and enjoy comparing deals.

Are curious about watches and eager to learn more.

Are independent, self-motivated, and reliable.



Bonus: You already follow watch pages, groups, or forums.





To apply, send the following:



1. Your DISC test - Take it here - 
 - Please send a link to your results.

2. Your personality test - Take it here - 
 - Please send a link to your results.

3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.

4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds): 





5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.



a. Tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. What are your career/life goals and in what amount of time?

b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use

c. Think of one objective you’ve had to complete in your current or previous role. Explain what metric(s) were you measured on (time spent, money saved, traffic/engagement/leads/sales, etc). Reverse engineer said objective with the target measurement in mind. Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in Canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?

d. What are your salary expectations from day one until the end of the first calendar year?



This isn’t just another gig — it’s a chance to dive into the fast-paced, luxury-driven world of watches and become a master at spotting hidden gems others overlook.



Ready to start the hunt?

Apply now — let’s find treasures together.



— Wilson

 your application to:

title: CEO Remote Executive Assistant (Sydney Hours) — Legal AI
description:
You must have a LinkedIN Profile and recommendations in order to apply for this role.



We are seeking an experienced CEO Executive Assistant to provide professional, high-standard executive support within a fast-moving Legal AI business. This is a high-accountability role for someone who ensures the CEO’s day-to-day operations run with precision and consistency—communications, scheduling, team coordination, and administration executed seamlessly, without reminders. You will have a passion for efficiency, proactively suggesting AI-based workflows to improve and streamline systems.



Key Responsibilities:



Inbox management: Proactively monitor, triage, organise, and draft responses; ensure timely follow-through; maintain a clean, current inbox and clear priorities.



Calendar management: Manage the CEO’s diary end-to-end, protect focus time, schedule intelligently, and prevent conflicts and last-minute disruption.



Scheduling and coordination: Arrange meetings with internal and external stakeholders, manage reschedules, confirm attendance, distribute logistics, and ensure meetings are set up properly.



Team coordination and delegation: Act as the CEO’s operational bridge to team leads and individual tea
mbers—communicating priorities, following up on deliverables, ensuring accountability across the team, and escalating blockers before they become problems. You will coordinate cross-functional tasks, ensure alignment on deadlines, and keep projects moving without the CEO needing to chase progress.



Executive-level stakeholder communication: Communicate professionally and confidently with executive clients, partners, stakeholders, and tea
mbers via phone and
, representing the CEO and company appropriately at all times.



ClickUp task, workflow, and project management: Capture actions, create and assign tasks, track progress, maintain visibility, and ensure completion—without the CEO needing to follow up.



AI workflow optimisation: Identify opportunities to streamline repetitive processes using AI tools, recommend and implement efficiency improvements, and stay across emerging productivity tools relevant to executive operations.



General executive administration: Preparation of documents, tracking and coordination of action items, and other administrative tasks required to keep execution moving smoothly.



Required Experience and Capabilities



• Minimum 6 years’ experience as an Executive Assistant supporting a CEO (or equivalent senior executive), ideally within a tech, SaaS, or startup environment.

• Excellent communication skills (phone and written): clear, concise, professional, and responsive; able to engage confidently with senior stakeholders.

• Proven ability to coordinate across teams—delegating on behalf of the CEO, managing follow-ups with team leads and individual contributors, and maintaining accountability without direct authority.

• High accountability: takes ownership of outcomes, follows through reliably, and ensures tasks are completed without prompting.

• Operational excellence: highly organised, detail-focused, and able to manage multiple priorities effectively.

• Seamless execution: anticipates needs, stays ahead of schedules and deliverables, and ensures the CEO’s week runs efficiently and predictably.

• Demonstrated interest in or experience with AI productivity tools and a willingness to continuously improve workflows.

• Availability aligned to Sydney business hours (AEST/AEDT).



Required Tools Proficiency



• Google Workspace and Microsoft 365

• Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams

• ClickUp (CRM, project management, team communication)

• Calendar scheduling tools (e.g. Calendly, 
, or similar)

• Familiarity with AI productivity tools (e.g. ChatGPT, Claude, Notion AI, or similar) is highly regarded



Desirable (Not Required)



• Experience supporting founders or CEOs in legal technology, SaaS, or high-growth startups

• Familiarity with investor relations coordination (scheduling, document preparation, follow-ups)

• Experience working with distributed or remote teams across multiple time zones



HOW TO APPLY:



To apply for the position, please send:



1. Your LinkedIn Profile URL - showing your recommendations from previous positions and a full listing of your prior positions linked to the company profiles where relevant.



2. A freshly recorded face-to-camera video explaining why you want the role and why you are the ideal candidate - Not AI Generated and NOT read off a script. You must mention something you have done in a prior role to help organise a CEO using AI, how did you help them with priorities, calendar management, project management across tea
mbers etc. Note: you will be interviewing with an automations consultant as the first interview.



3. Your resume



4. At the end of your application, please write the word "kangaroo" so I'll know you aren't mass applying and have read this entire job post.



5. List at least one reference we can reach out to that also has a LinkedIn profile.
